sentences.english: Ricky turned and walked away.
sentences.chinese: 里基转身走了。

sentences.english: She turned her head in surprise.
sentences.chinese: 她惊讶地转过头来。

sentences.english: Brigitte glared at him, turned on her heel (= turned away suddenly because of anger ) , and stomped out of the room.
sentences.chinese: 布丽吉特瞪了他一眼，猛地一转身，噔噔噔地走出了房间。

detailed_translations.chinese: 转动，使旋转；转弯；翻过来；兑换
detailed_translations.english: to move your body so that you are looking in a different direction

detailed_translations.chinese: 转弯；变化；(损害或有益于别人的)行为，举动，举止
detailed_translations.english: a sudden or unexpected change that makes a situation develop in a different way

sentences.english: I do most of my studying in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 我学习大都在晚上。

sentences.english: I’m usually out on Friday evenings.
sentences.chinese: 周五晚上我通常都不在家。

sentences.english: What are you doing tomorrow evening?
sentences.chinese: 明天晚上你打算做什么？

sentences.english: Peter left yesterday evening.
sentences.chinese: 彼得昨天晚上走了。

sentences.english: I’ll see you this evening.
sentences.chinese: 我今晚和你见面。

sentences.english: It was early evening by the time we got home.
sentences.chinese: 我们到家时已经是傍晚了。

sentences.english: We had just finished our evening meal when the doorbell rang.
sentences.chinese: 我们刚吃完晚饭门铃就响了。

sentences.english: a broadcast on the evening news
sentences.chinese: 晚间新闻广播

detailed_translations.english: the early part of the night between the end of the day and the time you go to bed

sentences.english: What time do you usually have dinner?
sentences.chinese: 你通常什么时候吃饭？

sentences.english: We’re having fish for dinner tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我们今天晚饭吃鱼。

sentences.english: What’s for dinner?
sentences.chinese: 晚饭吃什么？

sentences.english: the Club’s annual dinner
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部的年度晚宴

detailed_translations.english: the main meal of the day, eaten in the middle of the day or the evening

sentences.english: a great adventure
sentences.chinese: 一大奇遇

sentences.english: Ahab’s adventures at sea
sentences.chinese: 亚哈的海上历险

sentences.english: an adventure story
sentences.chinese: 一个历险故事

detailed_translations.english: an exciting experience in which dangerous or unusual things happen

sentences.english: It’s an old car, but it’s very reliable.
sentences.chinese: 这是一辆旧车，但是性能非常可靠。

sentences.english: They rushed to the hospital, but they were too late.
sentences.chinese: 他们急忙赶到医院，但是已经太迟了。

sentences.english: We’ve invited the boss, but she may decide not to come.
sentences.chinese: 我们邀请过老板，但她有可能决定不来。

sentences.english: an expensive but extremely useful book
sentences.chinese: 价钱很贵却是非常有用的一本书

sentences.english: ‘Has he got any experience?’ ‘No, but he’s keen to learn.’
sentences.chinese: “他有经验吗？”“没有，但他非常好学。”

detailed_translations.english: used to connect two statements or phrases when the second one adds something different or seems surprising after the first one

sentences.english: a rubbish bin
sentences.chinese: 垃圾桶

detailed_translations.english: food, paper etc that is no longer needed and has been thrown away

sentences.english: excessive waste in state spending
sentences.chinese: 政府支出方面的过度浪费

detailed_translations.chinese: 浪费；废物；荒地；损耗；地面风化物
detailed_translations.english: when something such as money or skills are not used in a way that is effective, useful, or sensible
to use more money, time, energy etc than is useful or sensible
waste materials, substances etc are unwanted because the good part of them has been removed

sentences.english: There’s so much to do. I don’t know where to start.
sentences.chinese: 有那么多的事情要做，我都不知道从哪里开始。

sentences.english: She wanted to start her own catering business.
sentences.chinese: 她想自己创立一家餐饮公司。

detailed_translations.english: to do something that you were not doing before, and continue doing it

sentences.english: No-one enjoys paying tax.
sentences.chinese: 没人喜欢缴税。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of money that you must pay to the government according to your income, property, goods etc and that is used to pay for public services

detailed_translations.chinese: 对…征税； 使负担重， 使费尽力气
detailed_translations.english: to charge a tax on something

sentences.english: Car buyers tend to replace worn-out tyres with the same brand.
sentences.chinese: 汽车的买主们倾向于用同一品牌的轮胎更换废旧轮胎。

detailed_translations.english: Something that is worn out is so old, damaged, or thin from use that it cannot be used anymore

sentences.english: The latest incident is representative of a wider trend.
sentences.chinese: 最近发生的事件代表了一个更大的趋势。

sentences.english: an elected representative of the people
sentences.chinese: 民选代表

detailed_translations.english: typical of a particular group or thing
someone who has been chosen to speak, vote, or make decisions for someone else

sentences.english: National boundaries are becoming increasingly meaningless in the global economy.
sentences.chinese: 在全球经济中，国界已经变得越来越没有意义。

sentences.english: We would need their agreement to build outside the city boundary .
sentences.chinese: 我们在市界以外的地方建房需要他们批准。

sentences.english: The stream curves round to mark the boundary of his property.
sentences.chinese: 小河打了个弯，为他这块地划出了边界。

sentences.english: Anything that crosses the boundary of a black hole cannot get back.
sentences.chinese: 任何物质只要跨越黑洞的界线就再也无法出来。

sentences.english: We walked through the churchyard towards the boundary wall .
sentences.chinese: 我们穿过教堂墓地，向院墙走去。

sentences.english: The property’s boundary line is 25 feet from the back of the house.
sentences.chinese: 这块地产的边界线在屋后25英尺的地方。

sentences.english: boundary disputes between neighbouring countries
sentences.chinese: 邻国之间的边界争端

detailed_translations.english: the real or imaginary line that marks the edge of a state, country etc, or the edge of an area of land that belongs to someone

sentences.english: The airplane crashed on a hillside.
sentences.chinese: 飞机在山坡上坠毁。

sentences.english: They are quarrying the hillside for marble.
sentences.chinese: 他们正从山坡上采大理石。

sentences.english: They sat and had their lunch on a grassy hillside.
sentences.chinese: 他们坐在长满草的山坡上吃午饭。

detailed_translations.english: the sloping side of a hill

sentences.english: a steep slope
sentences.chinese: 陡坡

sentences.english: a gentle
sentences.chinese: 缓坡

sentences.english: She looked back up the grassy slope.
sentences.chinese: 她回头望了一眼那绿草如茵的坡地。

sentences.english: a pleasant garden that slopes down to the river
sentences.chinese: 一座向河边倾斜的宜人花园

detailed_translations.english: a piece of ground or a surface that slopes
if the ground or a surface slopes, it is higher at one end than the other

sentences.english: He depended on his writing for his income.
sentences.chinese: 他靠写作谋生。

sentences.english: You can depend on Jane – she always keeps her promises.
sentences.chinese: 你可以相信简——她一向都信守诺言。

detailed_translations.english: to need the support, help, or existence of someone or something in order to exist, be healthy, be successful etc

sentences.english: Jan’s mother was dependent on her for physical care.
sentences.chinese: 简的母亲要靠简来照顾。

sentences.english: Do you have any dependent children (= who you are still supporting financially ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有需要扶养的孩子？

detailed_translations.english: needing someone or something in order to exist, be successful, be healthy etc

sentences.english: ...the city's traditional dependence on tourism.
sentences.chinese: …这个城市对旅游业的传统依赖。

detailed_translations.english: when you depend on the help and support of someone or something else in order to exist or be successful

sentences.english: Some of them depend on what your program does.
sentences.chinese: 其中一些取决于您的程序要做什么。

sentences.english: It all depend on whether he like the boss or not.
sentences.chinese: 这完全取决于他是否喜欢这个老闆。

sentences.english: It will take about 24 hours for the glue to harden.
sentences.chinese: 胶水干透大约需要24小时。

detailed_translations.chinese: 变硬，变坚固；变坚强；变冷酷
detailed_translations.english: to become firm or stiff, or to make something firm or stiff

detailed_translations.chinese: (Harden)人名；(英、德、罗、瑞典)哈登；(法)阿尔当

sentences.english: clear instructions
sentences.chinese: 明确的指示

sentences.english: The question wasn’t very clear.
sentences.chinese: 这问题不是很清楚。

sentences.english: It’s the clearest guide I’ve used.
sentences.chinese: 我从没用过这么清晰易懂的指南。

sentences.english: Perhaps I tried to cover too much and didn’t make myself clear (= express myself well ) .
sentences.chinese: 可能是我涉及的内容太多，没有表达清楚。

sentences.english: If you don’t understand, it’s best to say so and get things clear .
sentences.chinese: 如果你不明白，那就最好照直说并把事情弄清楚。

sentences.english: If I catch you smoking again, you’re grounded. Do I make myself clear (= used when you are angry ) ?
sentences.chinese: 如果再让我发现你抽烟，我就罚你不准出门。我的话你听清楚了吗？

sentences.english: Snowplows have been out clearing the roads.
sentences.chinese: 扫雪机已经出动，去清扫路面了。

detailed_translations.english: expressed in a simple and direct way so that people understand
to make somewhere emptier or tidier by removing things from it

sentences.english: She swam out into the cool water.
sentences.chinese: 她往外游向清凉的水里。

sentences.english: The evening air was cool.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚的空气很凉爽。

sentences.english: Relax in the sun with a cool drink.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光下喝杯清凉饮料放松一下。

sentences.english: the cooler weather of September
sentences.chinese: 九月较凉爽的天气

detailed_translations.english: low in temperature, but not cold, often in a way that feels pleasant
to make something slightly colder, or to become slightly colder
a temperature that is pleasantly cold
used to tell someone to stop being angry, violent etc

sentences.english: She asked him to leave, but he refused.
sentences.chinese: 她叫他走，但他不肯。

sentences.english: When he offered all that money, I could hardly refuse (= could not refuse ) , could I?
sentences.chinese: 他愿意给那么多钱，我怎么可能拒绝呢？

sentences.english: The town made a weekly collection of refuse.
sentences.chinese: 该镇每周收一次垃圾。

detailed_translations.english: to say firmly that you will not do something that someone has asked you to do
waste material that has been thrown away

sentences.english: Her country suffered through her refusal to accept change.
sentences.chinese: 她的国家因为她拒绝接受变革而受了害。

detailed_translations.english: when you say firmly that you will not do, give, or accept something

sentences.english: Have you made all your travel arrangements?
sentences.chinese: 你的旅行都安排好了吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 整理， 排列； 安排； 准备工作
detailed_translations.english: plans and preparations that you must make so that something can happen

sentences.english: The number of people who have the disease has decreased significantly in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，这种病的患者人数明显下降。

sentences.english: They want to decrease their reliance on oil.
sentences.chinese: 他们想减少对石油的依赖。

sentences.english: There has been a steady decrease of temperature.
sentences.chinese: 气温在持续下降。

detailed_translations.english: to become less or go down to a lower level, or to make something do this
the process of becoming less, or the amount by which something becomes less

sentences.english: We eventually took off at 11 o'clock and arrived in Juneau at 1:30.
sentences.chinese: 我们终于在11点起飞，1:30到达朱诺。

sentences.english: He took off at once and headed back to the motel.
sentences.chinese: 他出人意料地立刻就离开了，然后回到了那家汽车旅馆。

detailed_translations.chinese: 中文释义:（飞机等）起飞；匆忙离开
detailed_translations.english: When an aeroplane takes off, it leaves the ground and starts flying

sentences.english: The cushions are starting to wear a little.
sentences.chinese: 这些靠垫开始有点磨破了。

sentences.english: His jeans have worn thin at the knees.
sentences.chinese: 他牛仔裤的膝盖处已经磨薄了。

sentences.english: You’ve worn a hole in your sock.
sentences.chinese: 你的袜子磨出了个洞。

detailed_translations.english: to become thinner or weaker after continuous use, or to make something do this

sentences.english: My salary is paid into my bank account.
sentences.chinese: 我的工资直接存入我的银行账户。

sentences.english: I’ve opened an account with Barclay’s Bank.
sentences.chinese: 我在巴克莱银行开了一个账户。

sentences.english: My husband and I have a joint account (=  one that is shared between two people  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫有个联名账户。

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement in which a bank keeps your money safe so that you can pay more in or take money out

sentences.english: There are several departures for New York every day.
sentences.chinese: 每天有好几个班次去纽约。

detailed_translations.english: an act of leaving a place, especially at the start of a journey

sentences.english: Flights by Air Europe depart Gatwick on Tuesdays.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲航空公司的航班每逢周二从盖特威克机场起飞。

detailed_translations.chinese: 离开；出发，起程；违反；去世
detailed_translations.english: to leave, especially when you are starting a journey

sentences.english: black boots with high heels
sentences.chinese: 有高跟的黑靴子

detailed_translations.english: the curved back part of your foot
(of a vessel) to lean over; list

sentences.english: back-up copies of your files
sentences.chinese: 你的文档的备份

sentences.english: Could you copy this letter and send it out, please?
sentences.chinese: 你能把这封信复印一份发出去吗？

detailed_translations.english: something that is made to be exactly like another thing
to deliberately make or produce something that is exactly like another thing

sentences.english: a package marked ‘ return to sender ’
sentences.chinese: 标有“退回寄件人”字样的包裹

detailed_translations.english: the person who sent a particular letter, package, message etc

sentences.english: They went into town with the intention of visiting the library.
sentences.chinese: 他们进了城，打算参观图书馆。

detailed_translations.english: a plan or desire to do something

sentences.english: The purpose of this meeting is to elect a new chairman.
sentences.chinese: 这次会议的目的是选出一位新主席。

detailed_translations.english: the purpose of something is what it is intended to achieve

sentences.english: Every bit of content advertises something, whether on purpose or not.
sentences.chinese: 每一丁点的内容都在替什么做宣传，不管是有意还是无意。

sentences.english: Maybe he does this on purpose?
sentences.chinese: 也许他是故意这么做的？

detailed_translations.english: not by accident; deliberately

sentences.english: I’m sorry, there isn’t a lock on the bathroom door.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，浴室门上没有锁。

sentences.english: The key turned stiffly in the lock.
sentences.chinese: 这把钥匙开锁不灵活。

sentences.english: a bike lock
sentences.chinese: 自行车锁

sentences.english: Did you lock the car?
sentences.chinese: 你把汽车锁好了吗？

detailed_translations.english: a thing that keeps a door, drawer etc fastened and is usually opened with a key or by moving a small metal bar
to fasten something, usually with a key, so that other people cannot open it, or to be fastened like this

sentences.english: All the furniture was covered in dust .
sentences.chinese: 所有的家具都蒙上了灰尘。

sentences.english: a thick layer of dust
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的一层灰尘

sentences.english: There’s not a speck of dust in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 厨房里一尘不染。

sentences.english: Dust particles floated in the sunlight.
sentences.chinese: 阳光里飘浮着尘埃颗粒。

sentences.english: A sudden breeze sent motes of dust (= small bits of dust ) dancing in the air.
sentences.chinese: 突然刮起一阵微风吹得灰尘飞扬。

detailed_translations.english: dry powder consisting of extremely small bits of dirt that is in buildings on furniture, floors etc if they are not kept clean

sentences.english: A vote for us is not a wasted vote.
sentences.chinese: 投我们的票是不会白投的。

sentences.english: The proposal was rejected by 19 votes to 7.
sentences.chinese: 那项提议以19票对7票被否决。

sentences.english: policies designed to win votes in the South
sentences.chinese: 旨在赢取南方选票的各项政策

sentences.english: It’s the club secretary that counts the votes.
sentences.chinese: 俱乐部干事负责清点选票。

detailed_translations.english: an act of voting in an elec­tion or meeting, or the choice that you make when you vote

detailed_translations.chinese: 提议，使投票；投票决定；公认
detailed_translations.english: to show which person or party you want, or whether you support a plan, by marking a piece of paper, raising your hand etc

sentences.english: We watched the waves crashing against the rocks.
sentences.chinese: 我们看着海浪哗啦哗啦地冲击岩石。

sentences.english: The plates went crashing to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声摔落到地上。

sentences.english: A large branch came crashing down .
sentences.chinese: 一根大树枝啪啦一声掉落下来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 倒下，坠落；发出撞击声；垮台，破产
detailed_translations.english: to hit something or someone extremely hard while moving, in a way that causes a lot of damage or makes a lot of noise
to have an accident in a car, plane etc by violently hitting something else
a sudden loud noise made by something falling, breaking etc

sentences.english: the personnel department
sentences.chinese: 人事部

sentences.english: the English department
sentences.chinese: 英语系

detailed_translations.english: one of the groups of people who work together in a particular part of a large organization such as a hospital, university, company, or government

sentences.english: I really like the variety the store has to offer.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢这家商店商品的丰富多样。

sentences.english: The lake has more than 20 varieties of fish.
sentences.chinese: 那个湖里有二十多种鱼。

sentences.english: a rare variety of orchid
sentences.chinese: 兰花的稀有品种

detailed_translations.english: the differences within a group, set of actions etc that make it interesting

sentences.english: The dull, absent look on her face implied boredom.
sentences.chinese: 她脸上呆滞、茫然的神情说明她觉得无聊了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺席的；缺少的；心不在焉的；茫然的
detailed_translations.english: not at work, school, a meeting etc, because you are sick or decide not to go
to not go to a place or take part in an event where people expect you to be

sentences.english: In the absence of any evidence, the police had to let Myers go.
sentences.chinese: 警察没有证据，只好把迈尔斯放了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 缺席， 不在； 缺席的时间， 外出期； 缺乏， 不存在
detailed_translations.english: when you are not in the place where people expect you to be, or the time that you are away

sentences.english: Over five million copies of the paper are printed every day.
sentences.chinese: 这份报纸每日印量超过五百万。

sentences.english: When the book was first written no publisher would print it.
sentences.chinese: 这本书刚写成时没有出版商愿意出版。

sentences.english: There was no print at all on the backs of the tickets.
sentences.chinese: 门票背面没有印任何文字。

detailed_translations.english: to produce many printed copies of a book, newspaper etc
writing that has been printed, for example in books or newspapers

sentences.english: It’s only eight days till Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 还有8天就到圣诞节了。

sentences.english: They woke at eight (= eight o’clock ).
sentences.chinese: 他们是8点钟醒的。

sentences.english: My parents died when I was eight (= eight years old ).
sentences.chinese: 我8岁时父母就去世了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 8

sentences.english: Until then, students could leave after the eighth grade, and a lot of them did.
sentences.chinese: 那时，学生上完八年级就可以辍学，许多学生的确这样做了。

sentences.english: Then, in eighth or ninth grade, I studied astronomy, cosmology, and the origins of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 后来，在八、九年级的时候，我在学习天文学，宇宙学和宇宙的起源。

sentences.english: And this whole note obviously can be subdivided into two half notes and each of the half notes into two quarter notes each of these quarter notes into two eighth notes, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 这个全音符,很明显,可以再分为两个半音符,每个半音符又可以再细分为两个四分之一音符,每个四分之一音符可以再分为两个八分之一音符,等等

detailed_translations.english: one of eight equal parts of something
one of eight equal parts of something

sentences.english: At least eighteen bullets were fired.
sentences.chinese: 至少射出了18颗子弹。

sentences.english: Jim was eighteen (= 18 years old ).
sentences.chinese: 吉姆18岁。

detailed_translations.english: the number 18
the number 18

sentences.english: The first accurate census, I think, is in Copenhagen at the end of the eighteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 我认为,第一次精确的人口普查,是在十八世纪末的哥本哈根

sentences.english: Indeed, arguably a modern military power, at least in the seventeenth and early eighteenth-century sense, and he injects European culture into Russia.
sentences.chinese: 至少在十七世纪和十八世纪早期,它可以算是一个现代化的军事大国,同时 他将欧洲文化注入俄国

detailed_translations.chinese: 第十八的，第十八个的；十八分之一的

sentences.english: The band was incredibly successful in the eighties.
sentences.chinese: 这支乐队在80年代红透半边天。

detailed_translations.english: the number 80

detailed_translations.chinese: 八十的，八十个的；八十岁的

detailed_translations.english: the number 80

sentences.english: This week's on screen is dedicated to the eightieth Academy Awards better knows as the Oscar which, yes, really will take place this Sunday we are relive in format.

sentences.chinese: 他崇高的志向

sentences.chinese: 法庭被要求对少年犯采取更为灵活的处理方法。

sentences.chinese: 加利福尼亚州对这一问题持强硬立场。

detailed_translations.english: to start to deal with or think about something in a particular way

sentences.english: She decided to put the baby up for adoption .
sentences.chinese: 她决定让人收养那个婴儿。

detailed_translations.english: the act or process of adopting a child

sentences.chinese: 那只猴子到处乱窜。

sentences.chinese: 这只猴子囫囵吞下食物。

sentences.chinese: 长颈鹿生长在非洲。

sentences.english: The practice still prevails in some parts of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 这种做法在非洲某些地区仍然很盛行。

sentences.chinese: 他只身长途跋涉， 从东向西横穿整个非洲大陆。

sentences.english: ...the African continent.
sentences.chinese: …非洲大陆。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Africa or its people
someone from Africa

sentences.english: Our agent in Rio deals with all our Brazilian business.
sentences.chinese: 我们在里约热内卢的业务代表处理我们在巴西的全部业务。

detailed_translations.english: a person or company that represents another person or company, especially in business

sentences.english: a UN agency responsible for helping refugees
sentences.chinese: 负责为难民提供帮助的联合国机构

sentences.english: the Environmental Protection Agency
sentences.chinese: 环保局

detailed_translations.english: an organization or department, especially within a government, that does a specific job

sentences.english: We have similar tastes in music.
sentences.chinese: 我们对音乐的品位相近。

sentences.english: Both approaches seem to achieve similar results.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法都得出了相似的结果。

sentences.english: A number of his friends had been affected in a similar way .
sentences.chinese: 他的一些朋友也受到了类似的影响。

sentences.english: The two products look quite similar .
sentences.chinese: 这两种产品看上去很相似。

detailed_translations.english: almost the same

sentences.chinese: 公司解雇他做得对。

sentences.chinese: 只有足够多的民众起来要求，政客们才会采取行动。

sentences.english: The padding acts as a cushion if the player falls or is hit by the ball.
sentences.chinese: 万一球员摔倒或者被球击中，衬垫可以起到缓冲作用。

sentences.english: The new president’s first act should be to end the war.
sentences.chinese: 新总统的第一步行动应当是结束战争。

detailed_translations.english: to do something in a particular way or for a particular reason
one thing that you do

sentences.english: As a kid he’d never share his toys.
sentences.chinese: 他小时候从不肯与人分享他的玩具。

one of the equal parts into which the  ownership  of a company is divided

sentences.chinese: 活跃好动的年轻人玩的游戏

sentences.english: She’s over 80, but is still very active.
sentences.chinese: 她80多岁了，但仍旧很活跃。

sentences.english: He became politically active at college.
sentences.chinese: 他上大学时开始积极参与政治活动。

detailed_translations.english: always busy doing things, especially physical or mental activities

sentences.english: Everyone is free to engage in peaceful political activity.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都可以自由参加和平的政治活动。

sentences.english: fund-raising activities
sentences.chinese: 筹款活动

sentences.english: Regular physical activity helps to control your weight.
sentences.chinese: 定期参加体育活动有助于控制体重。

detailed_translations.english: things that people do, especially in order to achieve a particular aim

sentences.english: I forgot to set the burglar alarm.
sentences.chinese: 我忘记打开防盗警报器了。

sentences.english: Car alarms are always going off in the street.
sentences.chinese: 街上总有汽车警报器在响。

sentences.english: a sophisticated alarm system
sentences.chinese: 精密的警报系统

sentences.english: We could not see what had alarmed him.
sentences.chinese: 我们不明白是什么吓着他了。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that makes a loud noise to warn you of danger
If something alarms you, it makes you afraid or anxious that something unpleasant or dangerous might happen

sentences.english: I don’t drink alcohol anymore.
sentences.chinese: 我不再喝酒了。

sentences.english: alcohol abuse
sentences.chinese: 酗酒

sentences.english: people with alcohol problems
sentences.chinese: 有酗酒问题的人

detailed_translations.english: drinks such as beer or wine that contain a substance which can make you drunk

sentences.english: There is built-in storage space in all bedrooms.
sentences.chinese: 所有卧室里都有内置储藏空间。

sentences.english: the restaurant that Hugh and all his friends go to
sentences.chinese: 休和他所有的朋友们去的那家饭馆

detailed_translations.english: the whole of an amount, thing, or type of thing
the whole of a particular group or thing or to everyone or everything of a particular kind

name: all the peoples of the world
all the peoples of the earth

sentences.english: Fifth Avenue
sentences.chinese: 第五大街

sentences.english: Shaftesbury Avenue
sentences.chinese: 沙夫茨伯里街

sentences.english: a tree-lined avenue
sentences.chinese: 林荫道

detailed_translations.english: used in the names of streets in a town or city

sentences.english: She lives alone.
sentences.chinese: 她一个人生活。

sentences.english: You shouldn’t leave a child alone in the house.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该把小孩独自留在家里。

sentences.english: My wife and I like to spend time alone together away from the kids.
sentences.chinese: 我和妻子喜欢没有孩子打扰，过二人世界。

sentences.english: She has lived alone in this house for almost five years now.
sentences.chinese: 她现在已经独自在这所房子里住了差不多五年了。

detailed_translations.english: if you are alone in a place, there is no one with you
without any help from other people

sentences.english: Everything was covered in a thick layer of dust.
sentences.chinese: 所有东西上面都蒙着厚厚一层灰。

sentences.english: I decided to tell her everything.
sentences.chinese: 我决定把一切都告诉她。

sentences.english: Apart from the bus arriving late, everything else seemed to be going according to plan.
sentences.chinese: 除了公共汽车晚点之外，其他一切似乎都在按计划进行。

detailed_translations.english: each thing or all things

sentences.english: You can buy anything you want.
sentences.chinese: 你想要什么都可以买。

sentences.english: He was prepared to do anything to make a bit of money.
sentences.chinese: 只要能赚一点钱，他什么都愿意做。

sentences.english: Anything would be better than staying at home!
sentences.chinese: 做什么都比待在家里好！

sentences.chinese: 你可以写游泳、写滑雪或者其他任何你喜欢的活动。

detailed_translations.english: any thing, event, situation etc, when it is not important to say exactly which

sentences.chinese: 道德水准普遍下降。

sentences.english: ways to improve your general health
sentences.chinese: 全面提高身体素质的方法

sentences.english: There is one exception to this general principle.
sentences.chinese: 这个一般性原则有一例外

sentences.english: a four-star general
sentences.chinese: 四星上将

detailed_translations.english: affecting all or most people, places or things
an officer of very high rank in the army or air force

sentences.english: The new arts centre will serve the whole community.
sentences.chinese: 这座新的艺术中心将为整个社区服务。

sentences.english: the Polish community in London
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦的波兰侨民团体

detailed_translations.english: the people who live in the same area, town etc

sentences.chinese: 气候渐渐发生了变化。

sentences.english: the gradual decline in manufacturing industry
sentences.chinese: 制造业的逐渐衰退

sentences.chinese: 教育是一个循序渐进的过程。

detailed_translations.english: happening slowly over a long period of time

sentences.english: I saw Peter as I was getting off the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我下公共汽车的时候看见了彼得。

sentences.english: As time passed, things seemed to get worse.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的推移，情况似乎变得更加糟糕了。

detailed_translations.english: while or when

sentences.chinese: 纳塔莉比她姐姐漂亮。

sentences.chinese: 你比我更需要那笔钱。

sentences.chinese: 那里的人比我预想的要多。

sentences.chinese: 如果价格超过60美元，我就不买了。

sentences.chinese: 她甚至比平时醒得更早。

sentences.english: Divorce is more common than it was a generation ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在离婚比上一代人常见了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比（用于形容词、副词的比较级之后）；除…外（用于other等之后）；与其…（用于 rather等之后）；一…就（用于 no sooner等之后）
detailed_translations.english: used when comparing two things, people, situations etc

sentences.english: When are we leaving?
sentences.chinese: 我们什么时候走？

sentences.chinese: 你是什么时候认识达纳尔博士的？

detailed_translations.chinese: 考虑到；既然；当…时；在…时；如果
什么时候，何时；（用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时；其时；当时
detailed_translations.english: at what time

sentences.chinese: 她工作努力，仿佛从不知疲倦似的。

sentences.chinese: 到这儿就好像到了自己家一样。

sentences.chinese: 这个小男孩急促而漫不经心地朗诵着诗，他好像既不懂这首诗又不喜欢这首诗。

sentences.chinese: 你工作时有人严密监视着，好像你不可靠似的， 这真叫人难堪。

sentences.chinese: 一位老人

sentences.chinese: 你多大年纪？

sentences.chinese: 你现在已经长大，可以自己弄早餐了。

sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯和我同年岁。

sentences.chinese: 专家对这些画作的年代意见不统一。

sentences.chinese: 我们生活在科技时代。

sentences.chinese: 看到她苍老了许多，他很担心。

sentences.chinese: 我喜欢年纪大点儿的这个。这个。

sentences.chinese: I：谁年纪较大？ 是你的姐妹还是你？

sentences.chinese: 两人当中萨拉年纪较长。

sentences.chinese: 村里长辈们的集会

a member of a tribe or other social group who is important and respected because they are old

sentences.chinese: 六个孩子当中他是老大。

detailed_translations.chinese: 最年长的；年事最高的（old的最高级）
detailed_translations.english: the eldest of a group of people, especially brothers and sisters, is the one who was born first

sentences.chinese: 他获得最佳男演员奖。

sentences.chinese: 我们的飞行员接受最好的训练。

sentences.chinese: 我们只用最好的原料。

detailed_translations.english: better than anything else or anyone else in quality, skill, how effective it is etc

sentences.chinese: 可以给每个窗口指定名称，还可以在每个窗口的底部显示一个状态栏以帮助区分窗口。

sentences.chinese: 我老婆在你昨天晚上借走的称底盘上发现了这个。

sentences.english: It was a bad accident – they’re lucky to be alive.
sentences.chinese: 这是一宗严重事故——他们能活着实属幸运。

sentences.english: My grandparents are still alive .
sentences.chinese: 我的祖父母和外祖父母都还健在。

sentences.english: We stayed alive by eating berries.
sentences.chinese: 我们靠吃浆果活命。

sentences.chinese: 他靠生命维持装置活着。

sentences.english: Apparently he’s alive and well and living in Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 看来他还健在，住在巴西。

detailed_translations.chinese: 活着的；活泼的；有生气的
detailed_translations.english: still living and not dead

sentences.chinese: 哪个班级孩子最多？

sentences.english: She’s one of the most experienced teachers in the district.
sentences.chinese: 她是该地区最有经验的教师之一。

detailed_translations.english: a larger amount or number than anyone or anything else
having the greatest amount of a particular quality

sentences.chinese: 这是50年来最严重的一次经济衰退。

sentences.chinese: 我最大的担忧是我们会把食物吃光。

sentences.english: What is the worst possible thing that can happen?
sentences.chinese: 最糟可能会发生什么事？

sentences.english: Aid is being sent to areas that have been worst affected by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 援助物资正在送往受地震影响最严重的地区。

detailed_translations.english: worse than anything or anyone else

sentences.chinese: 他虽然经验最少，却是最出色的老师。

sentences.english: He’s my least favourite member of staff.
sentences.chinese: 他是最不讨我喜欢的员工。

detailed_translations.english: smallest in size, amount, degree, etc.
less than anything or anyone else

sentences.english: I may go to America or I may not,it all depends.
sentences.chinese: 我也许去美国，也许不去，要视情况而定。

sentences.english: She scampered in London then went back to America.
sentences.chinese: 她在伦敦匆忙地游览了一番，然后回到了美国。

sentences.english: Some of the mountains in America have not yet been mapped out.
sentences.chinese: 美洲有些山脉还没有在地图上标出来。

sentences.english: Her mother is American.
sentences.chinese: 她妈妈是美国人。

sentences.english: a famous American writer
sentences.chinese: 一位著名的美国作家

detailed_translations.english: relating to the US or its people
someone from the US

sentences.english: The department occupies an office just a mile from the White House.
sentences.chinese: 该部门就在离白宫一英里远的地方有个办公楼。

sentences.english: Did you go to the office (= the office where you work ) today?
sentences.chinese: 今天你去办公室了吗？

sentences.english: the increased demand for office space
sentences.chinese: 对办公室空间日益增长的需求

sentences.english: the Foreign Office
sentences.chinese: 外交部

detailed_translations.english: a building that belongs to a company or organization, with rooms where people can work at desks

sentences.english: an official investigation into the causes of the explosion
sentences.chinese: 对此次爆炸事件原因的官方调查

sentences.english: the official policy on education
sentences.chinese: 官方的教育政策

sentences.english: official statistics about illegal drug use
sentences.chinese: 非法使用毒品的官方统计数据

sentences.english: You will have to get official permission first.
sentences.chinese: 你必须先得到正式许可。

sentences.english: Finally the letter of appointment came, making it all official.
sentences.chinese: 任命书终于来了，这样一切都名正言顺了。

detailed_translations.english: approved of or done by someone in authority, especially the government

detailed_translations.chinese: 官员， 行政人员， 高级人员
detailed_translations.english: someone who is in a position of authority in an organization

sentences.english: He made funny faces to amuse the children.
sentences.chinese: 他做鬼脸逗孩子们开心。

sentences.english: The kids amused themselves playing hide-and-seek.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们玩捉迷藏玩。

sentences.english: Doing jigsaws would amuse Amy for hours on end.
sentences.chinese: 拼图能让埃米连续玩上几个小时。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone laugh or smile

sentences.english: They live at 18 Victoria Street.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在维多利亚街18 号。

sentences.english: Does this train stop at Preston?
sentences.chinese: 这列火车在普雷斯顿停吗？

sentences.english: I was waiting at the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 我在公共汽车站等着。

sentences.english: Liz and her friend sat down at a corner table.
sentences.chinese: 莉兹和她的朋友在靠角落的一张桌子旁坐下。

sentences.english: Turn left at the church.
sentences.chinese: 在教堂那里朝左转。

sentences.english: We’ll meet at Harry’s (=  at Harry’s house  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们将在哈里家碰头。

sentences.english: I spent an unpleasant hour at the dentist’s.
sentences.chinese: 我在牙医诊所度过了难熬的一小时。

sentences.chinese: 电影8点钟开始。

detailed_translations.english: used to say exactly where something or someone is, or where something happens

sentences.chinese: 飞机失事，机上200人全部遇难。

sentences.chinese: 他上船时，船晃了起来。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在飞机上；[船] 在船上；在火车上
detailed_translations.english: on or onto a ship, plane, or train
on or onto a ship, plane, or train

sentences.english: the problems of everyday life
sentences.chinese: 日常生活中的问题

sentences.english: wearing everyday clothes
sentences.chinese: 穿平常衣服

sentences.english: a simple, everyday object
sentences.chinese: 简单的日常物品

sentences.chinese: 用一般的日常语言把它描述一下。

detailed_translations.english: ordinary, usual, or happening every day

sentences.chinese: 我给你拿点喝的好吗？

sentences.english: I can’t turn down the offer of a free trip to Milan!
sentences.chinese: 我怎能拒绝免费去米兰旅行的机会！

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone if they would like to have something, or to hold something out to them so that they can take it
a statement saying that you are willing to do something for someone or give them something

sentences.english: Anne’s sight is very good for someone of her age.
sentences.chinese: 安妮的视力对于她这个年龄的人来说算是非常好的。

sentences.english: He began to lose his sight six years ago.
sentences.chinese: 六年前他开始视力衰退。

sentences.english: an emergency operation to save his sight
sentences.chinese: 挽救他视力的紧急手术

sentences.english: You will get a free sight test if you are under 16.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不满16岁，可以免费检查视力。

detailed_translations.english: the physical ability to see
to see something from a long distance away, or see something you have been looking for

sentences.english: For instance they wanted me to switch to GPL or else they would find me in violation of their license.
sentences.chinese: 比如，他们想让我切换到GPL许可协议下，否则他们将认为我违反了他们的许可协议。

sentences.english: He was tired but otherwise in good health.
sentences.chinese: 他除了累身体很好。

sentences.english: I could hear the distant noise of traffic. Otherwise all was still.
sentences.chinese: 我能听见远处车流的声音，除此之外，一切都很安静。

sentences.english: This spoiled an otherwise excellent piece of work.
sentences.chinese: 这就把本来很出色的一件作品毁掉了。

sentences.english: Their arrival livened up an otherwise dull afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 他们的到来使原本沉闷的午后活跃起来了。

detailed_translations.english: except for what has just been mentioned

sentences.english: The other hotels are all full.
sentences.chinese: 其他的宾馆均已客满。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to all the people or things in a group apart from the one you have already men­tioned or the one that is already known about

sentences.english: I find it hard to cope with change.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得很难适应变化。

sentences.english: scientists worried about climatic change
sentences.chinese: 为气候变化感到担忧的科学家们

sentences.english: A change in personality may mean your teenager has a drug problem.
sentences.chinese: 十几岁的孩子如果性格上发生了变化，可能意味着有吸毒问题。

sentences.english: No major changes were made to the book.
sentences.chinese: 这本书没有大的修改。

sentences.english: She had a change of heart (= change in attitude ) and decided to stay.
sentences.chinese: 她改变主意，决定留下来。

sentences.english: Family life has undergone dramatic change in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来家庭生活发生了巨大的变化。

sentences.english: Matt emptied the loose change from his pockets.
sentences.chinese: 马特把口袋里所有的零钱都掏了出来。

detailed_translations.english: the process or result of something or someone becoming different

sentences.english: Thanks ever so much for your help, I really appreciate it.
sentences.chinese: 多谢你的帮助，我真的很感激。

sentences.english: I appreciate your concern , but honestly, I’m fine.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢你关心，不过说真的，我很好。

sentences.english: I’d appreciate it if you let me get on with my job.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能让我继续工作，我会非常感激。

sentences.english: Her abilities are not fully appreciated by her employer.
sentences.chinese: 她的才干没有得到雇主的充分赏识。

sentences.english: I’m not an expert, but I appreciate fine works of art.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：我不是专家，但我欣赏优秀的艺术作品。

detailed_translations.english: used to thank someone in a polite way or to say that you are grateful for something they have done

sentences.english: He was presented with a watch in appreciation of his long service.
sentences.chinese: 他获赠一块手表，作为对其长期服务的感谢。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of being grateful for something someone has done

sentences.english: He stared at her, but there was no sign of recognition .
sentences.chinese: 他盯着她看，但似乎没认出她来。

detailed_translations.english: the act of knowing someone or something because you have known or learned about them in the past

sentences.english: There’s a short poem at the beginning of every chapter.
sentences.chinese: 每一章的开头都有一首短诗。

sentences.english: From the beginning of my career as a journalist, I’ve been writing about gender issues.
sentences.chinese: 从我一开始干记者这一行，我就写性别议题的题材。

sentences.english: I thought he loved me; perhaps he did in the beginning .
sentences.chinese: 我以为他爱我，也许开始时他确实是爱我的。

sentences.english: That chance meeting marked the beginning of a long and happy relationship.
sentences.chinese: 那次邂逅展开了一段长久而幸福的关系。

sentences.english: This is just the beginning of a new and different life for you.
sentences.chinese: 这只是你新的别样生活的开始。

sentences.english: I said he would cause trouble, right from the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 我一开始就说过，他会惹事。

sentences.english: I opposed it from the very beginning.
sentences.chinese: 我一开始就反对。

sentences.english: The whole trip was a disaster from beginning to end.
sentences.chinese: 旅途从头到尾都在出乱子。

sentences.english: I think I have the beginnings of a cold.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉要感冒了。

sentences.english: He rose from humble beginnings to great wealth.
sentences.chinese: 他出身卑微，如今已腰缠万贯。

detailed_translations.english: the start or first part of an event, story, period of time etc

sentences.english: Damp had stained the walls.
sentences.chinese: 墙上留下了潮湿的痕迹。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使潮湿；使阻尼；使沮丧，抑制
detailed_translations.english: to dampen something
water in walls or in the air that causes things to be slightly wet
slightly wet, often in an unpleasant way

sentences.english: A state of emergency has been declared.
sentences.chinese: 已宣布进入紧急状态。

sentences.english: Mr Steel has been declared bankrupt
sentences.chinese: 斯蒂尔先生被宣布破产了。

sentences.english: We celebrate September 16, the day when Mexico declared independence from Spain (= officially stated that it was no longer ruled by Spain ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们在9月16日举行庆祝活动，这一天是墨西哥摆脱西班牙统治宣布独立的日子。

detailed_translations.english: to state officially and publicly that a particular situation exists or that something is true

sentences.english: Are you interested in world affairs?
sentences.chinese: 你对世界大事感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交部

sentences.english: Women had little role in public affairs.
sentences.chinese: 女性过去几乎不参与公共事务。

sentences.english: the Watergate affair
sentences.chinese: 水门事件

sentences.english: He had an affair with his boss that lasted six years.
sentences.chinese: 他和老板的暧昧关系持续了六年。

detailed_translations.english: public or political events and activities

sentences.english: In some cases people have had to wait several weeks for an appointment.
sentences.chinese: 在某些情况下，人们必须等上好几周才能得到约见。

sentences.english: a severe case of typhoid
sentences.chinese: 伤寒重病例

sentences.english: It is simply not the case that prison conditions are improving.
sentences.chinese: 监狱条件得到改善的情况绝非事实。

detailed_translations.english: a particular situation or a situation of a particular type

sentences.english: If I have to stay late at work tonight, it won’t matter because we can go out another night.
sentences.chinese: 如果今晚我必须工作到很晚的话，那也没关系，我们可以改天晚上再出去。

sentences.english: Does it matter what I think?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么想重要吗？

sentences.english: Do you think it matters that the cups and saucers don’t match?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得茶杯与杯托不相配要紧吗？

sentences.english: campaigning on issues that really matter
sentences.chinese: 以重大问题为竞选议题

sentences.english: Money was the only thing that mattered to him.
sentences.chinese: 对他来说，钱是唯一重要的东西。

sentences.english: I don’t care what it looks like – what matters is that it works.
sentences.chinese: 我不在乎外观——要紧的是它要管用。

sentences.english: At last she was with the man she loved and nothing else mattered .
sentences.chinese: 最终她和她所爱的男人在一起了，其他都无关紧要。

sentences.english: She said very little during the meal. Not that it mattered (= it was not important ) .
sentences.chinese: 她吃饭时话很少，那倒无所谓。

detailed_translations.english: to be important, especially to be important to you, or to have an effect on what happens

sentences.english: It had been a pleasant evening.
sentences.chinese: 那是个愉快的夜晚。

sentences.english: the pleasant climate of Southern California
sentences.chinese: 南加利福尼亚的宜人气候

sentences.english: The restaurant was large and pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅宽敞舒适。

sentences.english: Kate! What a pleasant surprise !
sentences.chinese: 凯特！真是让人惊喜！

detailed_translations.english: enjoyable or attractive and making you feel happy

sentences.english: Regular exercise is a good habit.
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼是个好习惯。

sentences.english: Thinking negatively can become a habit.
sentences.chinese: 消极的思维方式会成为一种习惯。

sentences.english: She has a habit of playing with her hair when she’s nervous.
sentences.chinese: 她有一个习惯，一紧张就拨弄自己的头发。

sentences.english: Some people drink alcohol as much from habit as from desire.
sentences.chinese: 有些人喝酒既是因为想喝，也是出于习惯。

detailed_translations.english: something that you do regularly or usually, often without thinking about it because you have done it so many times before

sentences.english: a bomb attack
sentences.chinese: 炸弹袭击

sentences.english: a knife attack
sentences.chinese: 持刀攻击

sentences.english: an arson attack
sentences.chinese: 纵火袭击

sentences.english: victims of racial attacks
sentences.chinese: 种族袭击的受害者

detailed_translations.chinese: 攻击， 进攻； 突然发作
detailed_translations.english: an act of violence that is intended to hurt a person or damage a place

sentences.english: a fear of flying
sentences.chinese: 害怕坐飞机

sentences.english: Fearing violence, the group asked for police protection.
sentences.chinese: 该团体担心发生暴力事件，所以请求警方保护。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling you get when you are afraid or worried that something bad is going to happen
to feel afraid or worried that something bad may happen

sentences.english: Stop throwing those stones!
sentences.chinese: 别再扔那些石头了！

detailed_translations.english: to block a hole or pipe so that water, smoke etc cannot go through it
if an activity comes to a stop, it stops happening

sentences.english: Marx and his followers were convinced that capitalism would destroy itself.
sentences.chinese: 马克思及其支持者确信资本主义将自我毁灭。

detailed_translations.english: someone who believes in a particular system of ideas, or who supports a leader who teaches these ideas

sentences.english: a rubbish heap
sentences.chinese: 垃圾堆

sentences.english: We piled the branches into heaps for burning.
sentences.chinese: 我们把树枝堆起来烧。

detailed_translations.english: a large untidy pile of things
to put a lot of things on top of each other in an untidy way

sentences.english: Leave the battery on charge all night.
sentences.chinese: 让电池充一晚上的电

sentences.english: Please charge your glasses and drink a toast to the bride and groom!
sentences.chinese: 请各位斟满酒杯向新娘、新郎敬酒！

detailed_translations.english: electricity that is put into a piece of electrical equipment such as a battery
to fill a glass

sentences.english: Give me a call to let me know you’ve arrived safely.
sentences.chinese: 打个电话给我，告诉我你已平安到达。

sentences.english: By the time the police arrived on the scene, the burglars had fled.
sentences.chinese: 警方赶到现场时，窃贼已经逃跑了。

sentences.english: When her wedding day arrived, she was really nervous.
sentences.chinese: 到了婚礼那天，她十分紧张。

detailed_translations.english: to get to the place you are going to

sentences.english: Only the timely arrival of the police prevented the situation from becoming worse.
sentences.chinese: 警方及时赶到才阻止了事态恶化。

sentences.english: Traffic problems account for one third of late arrivals.
sentences.chinese: 迟到的人有三分之一是因为交通问题。

sentences.english: The first arrivals at the concert got the best seats.
sentences.chinese: 最早来到音乐会的人坐上了最好的座位。

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something arrives somewhere

sentences.english: I’m saving this bottle of champagne for a special occasion.
sentences.chinese: 我要把这瓶香槟酒留到特别的日子喝。

sentences.english: She had met Zahid on two separate occasions.
sentences.chinese: 她遇到过扎希德两次。

sentences.english: This was the occasion for expressions of friendship by the two presidents.
sentences.chinese: 这是两位总统进行友好交流的时机。

detailed_translations.english: an important social event or ceremony

sentences.english: The morning mail has just been delivered.
sentences.chinese: 早晨的邮件刚送到。

sentences.english: Do you deliver on Saturdays?
sentences.chinese: 星期六你们送货吗？

sentences.english: I’m having some flowers delivered for her birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我在安排人给她送花祝贺生日。

detailed_translations.english: to take goods, letters, packages etc to a particular place or person

sentences.english: Most Indian restaurants offer free delivery.
sentences.chinese: 大多数印度餐馆提供免费外送服务。

sentences.english: You can expect delivery in a week to ten days.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在一周至十天内收到货物。

sentences.english: fresh milk deliveries
sentences.chinese: 新鲜牛奶递送

sentences.english: Mrs Howell had an easy delivery.
sentences.chinese: 豪厄尔太太的分娩很顺利。

detailed_translations.english: the act of bringing goods, letters etc to a particular person or place, or the things that are brought

sentences.english: I’m not usually attracted to blondes.
sentences.chinese: 我一般不喜欢金发女子。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone interested in something, or make them want to take part in something

sentences.english: Her eyes suddenly met his and she coloured slightly.
sentences.chinese: 她的目光突然和他相遇，她微微有点脸红了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…涂颜色，粉饰；歪曲；使脸红
detailed_translations.english: when someone colours, their face becomes redder because they are embarrassed

detailed_translations.chinese: 颜色；风格；气色，面色；外貌
detailed_translations.english: red, blue, yellow, green, brown, purple etc

sentences.english: The ceiling needs painting.
sentences.chinese: 天花板需要粉刷了。

sentences.english: brightly paintedhouses
sentences.chinese: 粉刷得很亮丽的房屋

sentences.english: The living room was painted in pastel shades of pink and blue.
sentences.chinese: 起居室被漆成淡雅的粉色和蓝色。

detailed_translations.english: to put paint on a surface
to make a picture, design etc using paint

sentences.english: Dave made a note of her address and phone number.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫记下了她的地址和电话号码。

sentences.english: I was going to write Kathy a note, but I decided to call her instead.
sentences.chinese: 我原来准备给凯茜写个便条，但又决定还是打电话给她。

sentences.english: The notes are at the back of the book.
sentences.chinese: 注解在书末。

detailed_translations.english: something that you write down to remind you of something

sentences.english: Rick accepted her offer of coffee.
sentences.chinese: 她请里克喝咖啡，他接受了。

sentences.english: He accepted the invitation to stay with us.
sentences.chinese: 他接受了邀请来我们家住。

sentences.english: His school reports said that he is always ready to accept a challenge (=  agree to do something difficult  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的学业报告上说他乐于接受挑战。

sentences.english: Please accept this small gift.
sentences.chinese: 请收下这份小小的礼物。

sentences.english: They offered me a job and I accepted.
sentences.chinese: 他们给我一份工作，我接受了。

sentences.english: He readily accepted her invitation (=  accepted it quickly  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他欣然接受了她的邀请。

detailed_translations.english: to take something that someone offers you, or to agree to do something that someone asks you to do

sentences.english: Ready meals sell well because of their convenience.
sentences.chinese: 即食餐因为方便销路好。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being suitable or useful for a particular purpose, especially by making something easier or saving you time

sentences.english: They no longer advertise alcohol or cigarettes at sporting events.
sentences.chinese: 他们不再在体育赛事上做烟酒广告了。

sentences.english: Colleges and universities have found that it pays to advertise (=  advertising brings good results  ) .
sentences.chinese: 大专院校发现做广告效果很好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 为…做广告， 宣传； 公告； 登广告
detailed_translations.english: to tell the public about a product or service in order to persuade them to buy it

sentences.english: Contact your local branch to arrange an appointment.
sentences.chinese: 请联络当地分部安排预约。

sentences.english: I’d like to arrange a business loan.
sentences.chinese: 我想办理一笔商业贷款。

sentences.english: Matthew arrived at 2 o'clock as arranged.
sentences.chinese: 马修两点钟依约而至。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安排， 准备； 整理
detailed_translations.english: to organize or make plans for something such as a meeting, party, or trip

sentences.english: There seemed to be no logical order to the sections.
sentences.chinese: 这几部分似乎没有逻辑顺序。

sentences.english: Let’s have some order in here.
sentences.chinese: 我们把这里整理一下吧。

sentences.english: The court ordered his release from prison.
sentences.chinese: 法院下令放他出狱。

detailed_translations.english: the way that things or events are arranged in relation to each other, so that one thing is first, another thing is second etc
to tell someone that they must do something, especially using your official power or authority

sentences.english: Try on clothing and shoes to make sure they fit.
sentences.chinese: 衣服和鞋要试穿以确保它们合适。

detailed_translations.english: If you try on a piece of clothing, you put it on to see if it fits you or if it looks nice

sentences.english: Yes, that’s the right answer .
sentences.chinese: 对，回答正确。

sentences.english: Is that the right time ?
sentences.chinese: 那个时间对吗？

sentences.english: I got most of the questions right .
sentences.chinese: 大部分问题我都答对了。

sentences.english: His ideas have now been proved right .
sentences.chinese: 他的观点现已证明是对的。

detailed_translations.english: a statement or piece of information that is right is correct and based on true facts
exactly in a particular position or place
used to check if what you have said is correct
exactly in a particular position or place

sentences.english: Sexual attraction is a large part of falling in love.
sentences.chinese: 堕入爱河很大部分是由于性吸引。

sentences.english: gravitational/magnetic attraction
sentences.chinese: 地心引力；磁力

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of liking sb, especially sexually

sentences.english: Much of his work is done by phone .
sentences.chinese: 他的工作大部分是通过电话进行的。

sentences.english: Who was that on the phone ?
sentences.chinese: 谁来的电话？

sentences.english: I wish Amy would get off the phone .
sentences.chinese: 我真希望埃米别再打电话了。

detailed_translations.english: a telephone

sentences.english: The telephone rang just as I was leaving.
sentences.chinese: 我正要走，电话铃响了。

detailed_translations.english: the system of communication that you use to have a conversation with someone in another place
to talk to someone by telephone

sentences.english: You may call it harmless fun, but I call it pornography.
sentences.chinese: 你可能会说这是无恶意的小玩笑，但是我却认为这是色情。

sentences.english: I heard someone calling in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我听到远处有人在叫。

detailed_translations.english: to use a word or name to describe someone or something in a particular way

sentences.english: It didn’t move, so she pushed harder.
sentences.chinese: 它一动不动，因此她加力去推。

sentences.english: I promised to push him on the swings for as long as he wanted.
sentences.chinese: 我答应他想在秋千上荡多久我就推多久。

sentences.english: shoppers pushing their grocery carts
sentences.chinese: 推着购物车的购物者

detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something move by pressing them with your hands, arms etc
to make someone or something move by pressing them with your hands, arms etc

sentences.english: Why don't you go and put it up on the college notice board?
sentences.chinese: 你干嘛不去学校的公告牌上打个广告？

sentences.english: Police have so far failed to establish a connection between the two murders.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止警方尚未确定两宗凶杀案之间有关联。

sentences.english: The evidence was there in the file but no one made the connection .
sentences.chinese: 证据就在档案里，但没有人把它们联系起来。

sentences.english: Students often see little connection between school and the rest of their lives.
sentences.chinese: 学生往往看不到上学和今后生活的联系。

sentences.english: He demonstrated the close connection between social conditions and health.
sentences.chinese: 他证明了社会条件和健康之间的密切联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 连接； 联系； 连接物， 连接点； 亲戚
detailed_translations.english: the way in which two facts, ideas, events etc are related to each other, and one is affected or caused by the other

sentences.english: The boy stole a look at his father with grimace.
sentences.chinese: 那男孩扮着鬼脸偷看了他父亲一眼。

sentences.english: They have got the doctor in to look at the child.
sentences.chinese: 他们请医生来给孩子看病。

sentences.english: Just look at the airs she's giving herself, looking down her nose at everybody.
sentences.chinese: 你看她的神气， 简直是目中无人。

sentences.english: Union leaders and company bosses will meet tomorrow in an attempt to reach a settlement .
sentences.chinese: 工会领导人和公司老板将于明天举行会议以期达成协议。

sentences.english: His lawyers are understood to be negotiating a settlement .

detailed_translations.english: an official agreement or decision that ends an argument, a court case, or a fight, or the action of making an agreement

sentences.english: I don’t claim to be a feminist, but I’d like to see more women in top jobs.

detailed_translations.english: to state that something is true, even though it has not been proved

detailed_translations.chinese: 要求； 认领； 索赔； 声称， 断言
detailed_translations.english: a statement that something is true, even though it has not been proved

sentences.chinese: 这一切都是精心的伪装。

sentences.chinese: 这家工厂雇用了2,000多名员工。

sentences.chinese: 他们订婚的消息在报上公布了。

sentences.english: This is his only public speaking engagement on the tour.
sentences.chinese: 这是他此行唯一一场公开演讲。

detailed_translations.english: an agreement between two people to marry, or the period of time they are engaged

sentences.english: Lou lifted the box easily, without using much effort.
sentences.chinese: 卢没费多大力气就把箱子搬了起来。

sentences.english: Frank put a lot of effort into the party.

sentences.chinese: 他把现款委托给一个生意合伙人投资一系列项目。

detailed_translations.english: to make a formal request, usually written, for something such as a job, a place at a university, or permission to do something

sentences.chinese: 她被授予一个奖项。

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is present in a particular place

sentences.english: a gentleman in evening dress
sentences.chinese: 穿晚礼服的绅士

sentences.chinese: 这出戏里演员是现代装束。

sentences.chinese: 苹果馅饼

sentences.chinese: 苹果树

sentences.chinese: 烤猪肉配苹果酱汁

sentences.chinese: 她是一名化学研究员。

sentences.chinese: 她丈夫向来胃口极大。

sentences.chinese: 刚刚过去的那个四月，我回到我在那长大的农场探望我的父母。 我在屋外漫步，沉浸在“家”的舒适感觉中——当时我真的很需要家的慰藉。

sentences.chinese: 这家工厂的关闭意味着 80 个工人面临失业。

sentences.chinese: 戴夫手臂断了。

sentences.chinese: 他抱着一摞书。

sentences.chinese: 数百万老年人生活在贫困之中。

sentences.english: We need an effective strategy to fight poverty .
sentences.chinese: 我们需要制定一个有效的对策来与贫困作斗争。

sentences.chinese: 缓解贫困和提高生活水平的不懈努力

sentences.chinese: 你要哪种味道的，巧克力还是香草？

sentences.chinese: 他遭到逮捕并被指控谋杀。

sentences.chinese: 我因鲁莽驾驶被捕。

sentences.chinese: 给我一份三明治，随便哪种都可以。

sentences.chinese: 她以这种方式死去，他心里有些内疚。

sentences.chinese: 这个问题将用对双方都公平的方式来解决。

sentences.chinese: 对主教任命方式的批评

sentences.chinese: 她举止镇定而从容。

sentences.english: Her children all had such good manners.
sentences.chinese: 她的孩子都很有礼貌。

sentences.chinese: 该报社论称政府软弱。

sentences.chinese: 宪法的第一条保障宗教信仰自由。

sentences.chinese: 对于他的绘画作品的艺术价值，人们褒贬不一。

sentences.chinese: 用于治疗癌症的一种药物

sentences.chinese: 医生开的处方药如果使用不当是非常危险的。

sentences.chinese: 大型制药公司利润丰厚。

sentences.chinese: 她由她的本区医生治疗。

sentences.english: I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Pugh.
sentences.chinese: 我想预约看皮尤医生。

sentences.english: a Doctor of Law

detailed_translations.english: someone who is trained to treat people who are ill

sentences.english: your family physician
sentences.chinese: 你的家庭医生

detailed_translations.english: a doctor

sentences.chinese: 那小男孩吃了好几满盘冰淇淋。

sentences.chinese: 他们把蛋糕分成两块，每人吃半块。

sentences.chinese: 他先慢慢地咬去苹果皮，然后再吃果肉。

sentences.english: cigarette ash

sentences.chinese: 那房子烧成了灰烬。

sentences.chinese: 他的骨灰被撒向大海。

sentences.chinese: 欧洲列强在亚洲扩大他们的管辖权。

sentences.chinese: 老师用粉笔在黑板上画了一张亚洲地图。

sentences.chinese: 在亚洲其他地区的广泛经历帮助他克服了文化障碍。

sentences.chinese: …助理国防部长。

detailed_translations.english: Assistant is used in front of titles or jobs to indicate a slightly lower rank. For example, an assistant director is one rank lower than a director in an organization.

sentences.chinese: 慢一点，我要喘口气。

sentences.chinese: 房间里全是烟，呼吸越来越困难。

sentences.chinese: 放松，深呼吸。
