sentences.english: The storm caused severe damage.
sentences.chinese: 这场暴风雨造成了严重的破坏。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严重的； 严厉的， 严格的； 严峻的， 艰难的； 朴素的， 不加装饰的
detailed_translations.english: severe problems, injuries, illnesses etc are very bad or very serious

sentences.english: He swallowed the last of his coffee and asked for the bill.
sentences.chinese: 他喝完最后一口咖啡，要求结账。

sentences.english: Most snakes swallow their prey whole .
sentences.chinese: 大多数蛇都是把猎物囫囵吞下。

detailed_translations.english: to make food or drink go down your throat and towards your stomach

sentences.english: In places, the path can be wet and slippery.
sentences.chinese: 路上有些地方可能又湿又滑。

sentences.english: the slippery notion of ‘standards’
sentences.chinese: “标准”这一模糊概念

detailed_translations.english: something that is slippery is difficult to hold, walk on etc because it is wet or  greasy

sentences.english: A bunch of keys hung from his belt.
sentences.chinese: 他的皮带上挂着一串钥匙。

sentences.english: Press the ‘Escape’ key to exit.
sentences.chinese: 按退出键退出。

sentences.english: Check your answers in the key at the back of the book.
sentences.chinese: 用书后的解答核对答案。

detailed_translations.english: a small specially shaped piece of metal that you put into a lock and turn in order to lock or unlock a door, start a car etc

sentences.english: He is ambitious and susceptible to flattery.
sentences.chinese: 他雄心勃勃，而且很喜欢听恭维话。

detailed_translations.english: praise that you do not really mean

sentences.english: Perry would always flatter Mrs. Mitchell by praising her cooking.
sentences.chinese: 佩里常常奉承米切尔太太，称赞她的烹调手艺。

detailed_translations.english: to praise someone in order to please them or get something from them, even though you do not mean it

sentences.english: It was warmer now, and the snow was beginning to melt.
sentences.chinese: 现在天气暖和了，雪开始融化。

sentences.english: Melt the butter in a saucepan.
sentences.chinese: 把黄油放在深平底锅里化开。

detailed_translations.english: if something solid melts or if heat melts it, it becomes liquid

sentences.english: The pain is getting worse.
sentences.chinese: 疼得越来越厉害了。

sentences.english: Greg was in a lot of pain.
sentences.chinese: 格雷格疼痛万分。

sentences.english: the pleasures and pains of growing old
sentences.chinese: 变老的苦与乐

detailed_translations.english: the feeling you have when part of your body hurts

sentences.english: stiff painful joints
sentences.chinese: 僵硬疼痛的关节

sentences.english: Is your arm very painful?
sentences.chinese: 你的手臂很疼吗？

sentences.english: The neck becomes swollen and painful to the touch (= hurts when you touch it ) .
sentences.chinese: 脖子肿起来了，一碰就疼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 痛苦的，疼痛的，令人不快的
detailed_translations.english: if a part of your body is painful, it hurts

sentences.english: Butterflies and moths are attracted to the wild flowers.
sentences.chinese: 蝴蝶和飞蛾为野花所吸引。

detailed_translations.english: a type of insect that has large wings, often with beautiful colours

sentences.english: You should have seen the dirt on that car!
sentences.chinese: 你没看见那车上沾了多少泥！

sentences.english: His face and hands were black with dirt.
sentences.chinese: 他的脸和手黑乎乎的，全是泥。

sentences.english: Michael threw his handful of dirt onto the coffin.
sentences.chinese: 迈克尔往棺材上撒了一把土。

detailed_translations.english: any substance that makes things dirty, such as mud or dust

sentences.english: a stack of dirty dishes in the sink
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里的一堆脏碟子

sentences.english: How did you get so dirty?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么会弄得这么脏？

sentences.english: kids telling dirty jokes
sentences.chinese: 讲着下流笑话的年轻人

sentences.english: a dirty magazine
sentences.chinese: 色情杂志

detailed_translations.english: covered in or marked by an unwanted substance

sentences.english: ...a black bird with a yellow beak.
sentences.chinese: …一只有着黄喙的黑鸟。

detailed_translations.english: the hard pointed mouth of a bird

sentences.english: Snow was falling heavily as we entered the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们进村的时候雪下得正大。

sentences.english: I could see footprints in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 我看到雪地里有脚印。

sentences.english: The town was buried under three feet of snow.
sentences.chinese: 小镇被三英尺厚的积雪覆盖着。

detailed_translations.english: soft white pieces of frozen water that fall from the sky in cold weather and cover the ground
if it snows, snow falls from the sky

sentences.english: In his youth his father bound him out to a tailor.
sentences.chinese: 他年轻时他父亲叫他去给一个裁缝当学徒。

sentences.english: Treatment is tailored to the needs of each patient.
sentences.chinese: 治疗方案是针对各个病人的需要而制订的。

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to make men’s clothes, that are measured to fit each customer perfectly
to make something so that it is exactly right for someone’s particular needs or for a particular purpose

sentences.english: a fast car
sentences.chinese: 速度很快的汽车

sentences.english: That can’t be the time - my watch must be fast.
sentences.chinese: 不可能是这个时间——一定是我的表快了。

sentences.english: Slow down – you’re driving too fast.
sentences.chinese: 慢点——你开得太快了。

detailed_translations.english: moving or able to move quickly
moving quickly

sentences.english: That was quick! I thought you’d be another hour.
sentences.chinese: 很快啊！我以为你还要一个小时呢。

sentences.english: It’s probably quicker by train.
sentences.chinese: 乘火车可能会快一点。

sentences.english: Have we got time for a quick drink?
sentences.chinese: 我们有时间喝口东西吗？

sentences.english: What’s the quickest way to the station?
sentences.chinese: 到车站怎么走最快？

sentences.english: We stopped to have a quick look at the church.
sentences.chinese: 我们停下来迅速地扫了一眼教堂。

sentences.english: Three bombs went off in quick succession (= quickly, one after the other ).
sentences.chinese: 瞬间有三个炸弹连续爆炸。

detailed_translations.english: lasting for or taking only a short time

sentences.english: The patient made a rapid recovery.
sentences.chinese: 病人迅速康复。

sentences.english: a period of rapid decline
sentences.chinese: 迅速衰退期

sentences.english: He fired three times in rapid succession (= one after another ) .
sentences.chinese: 他接连开了三枪。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done very quickly and in a very short time

sentences.english: Do you want me to cut the cake?
sentences.chinese: 要我切蛋糕吗？

sentences.english: They’re introducing CCTV cameras in an attempt to cut street crime in the area.
sentences.chinese: 为了减少该地区的街头犯罪，他们安装了闭路电视摄像机。

sentences.english: You need to cut the amount of fat and sugar in your diet.
sentences.chinese: 你需要减少饮食中脂肪和糖的摄入量。

sentences.english: Scientists are warning that unless carbon emissions are cut, we could be heading for an environmental catastrophe.
sentences.chinese: 科学家警告说如果不减少碳排放量，我们可能会面临环境灾难。

sentences.english: Seven hundred jobs will be lost in order to cut costs and boost profits.
sentences.chinese: 为了降低成本，提高利润，将削减700个职位。

sentences.english: The major aviation companies need to cut prices if they are to compete with budget airlines.
sentences.chinese: 大航空公司如果想和廉价的航空公司竞争，就需要降低价格。

sentences.english: Staffing levels had already been cut to the bone (= reduced to the lowest level possible ) .
sentences.chinese: 人员配备已经削减到了最低限度。

detailed_translations.english: to divide something or separate something from its main part, using scissors, a knife etc

sentences.english: pizza slices
sentences.chinese: 比萨块

sentences.english: Cut the tomatoes into slices .
sentences.chinese: 把番茄切成片。

detailed_translations.english: a thin flat piece of food cut from a larger piece
to hit a ball, for example in tennis or golf, so that it spins sideways instead of moving straight forward

sentences.english: a chocolate bar
sentences.chinese: 巧克力条

sentences.english: a chocolate cake
sentences.chinese: 巧克力蛋糕

sentences.english: a packet of chocolate biscuits
sentences.chinese: 一包巧克力饼干

sentences.english: I prefer milk chocolate to dark chocolate.
sentences.chinese: 和黑巧克力比起来，我更喜欢牛奶巧克力。

sentences.english: a box of chocolates
sentences.chinese: 一盒巧克力糖

detailed_translations.english: a sweet brown food that you can eat as a sweet or use in cooking to give foods such as cakes a special sweet taste

sentences.english: ‘Lunch? ’ ‘No thanks, I've already eaten. ’
sentences.chinese: “午餐？”“不，谢谢，我已吃过了。”

sentences.english: We got there early but Mike had already left.
sentences.chinese: 我们及早到了那里，但是迈克已经离开了。

detailed_translations.english: before now or before a particular time in the pas

sentences.english: She was even more beautiful than I had remembered.
sentences.chinese: 她比我记忆中更美。

sentences.english: a beautiful bunch of flowers
sentences.chinese: 一束美丽的花

detailed_translations.english: someone or something that is beautiful is extremely attractive to look at

sentences.english: ‘When’s your holiday?’ ‘Oh, not for ages yet.’
sentences.chinese: “你什么时候去休假？”“噢，不知何年何月呢。”

sentences.english: It could be months yet before they know their fate.
sentences.chinese: 可能要好几个月他们才能知道自己的命运。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize how much time will pass before something happens, or how long a situation will continue
used to introduce a fact, situation, or quality that is surprising after what you have just said

sentences.english: her beauty and grace
sentences.chinese: 她的美貌和优雅风姿

sentences.english: an area of outstanding natural beauty
sentences.chinese: 一个自然风景极美的地区

sentences.english: Millions of dollars are spent each year on beauty products.
sentences.chinese: 每年都有上千万的钱花在美容产品上。

sentences.english: She was considered a great beauty in her youth.
sentences.chinese: 她年轻时被视为大美人。

detailed_translations.english: a quality that people, places, or things have that makes them very attractive to look at

sentences.english: Down the bar, he tried it on the kid—he was drinking Scotch and water or something like that—and found out he could push him around.
sentences.chinese: 酒保走到吧台另一端，询问起那个小伙——他喝的是掺水的苏格兰威士忌之类的东西——发觉可以向他成功兜售。

detailed_translations.chinese: 苏格兰人的；苏格兰语的

sentences.english: You know, Gordon, I should not like you. You are Scottish, we have nothing in common and you are an economist.
sentences.chinese: 你知道吗，戈登，我不应该喜欢你，你是苏格兰人，又是个经济学家，我们没有任何共同的地方。

sentences.english: They took to the water like pigs to mud after they were put out to pasture on the uninhabited island of Longa off the North West Scottish coast.
sentences.chinese: 在被放养在苏格兰海岸西北部岛屿上无人照看的龙格牧场之后，这两只小家伙就像猪拱泥巴拔秧，硬是走水路游了回来。

sentences.english: These cases are dealt with by the Foreign Office, while Hague cases go through the Ministry of Justice in England and Wales, and the Scottish and Northern Irish court services.
sentences.chinese: 这些案件由外交部负责处理，而海牙公约缔约国的案件则由英格兰和威尔士司法部、以及苏格兰和北爱尔兰法庭进行处理。

detailed_translations.chinese: 苏格兰人(的), 苏格兰语（的）

sentences.english: He traveled Scotland last year.
sentences.chinese: 他去年在苏格兰旅行。

sentences.english: England, Scotland and Wales compose the island of Great Britain.
sentences.chinese: 英格兰、苏格兰和威尔士组成大不列颠岛国。

sentences.english: Why should they not go on to Scotland, if that had been the case?
sentences.chinese: 要是真象你所想的那样，那他们干吗不到苏格兰去呢？

sentences.english: Can you hang these in the wardrobe, please?
sentences.chinese: 请你把这些衣服挂到衣橱里去好吗？

sentences.english: fitted/built-in wardrobes (=wardrobes built against a wall or fitted between two walls)
sentences.chinese: 固定式/嵌入式衣柜

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture like a large cupboard that you hang clothes in

sentences.english: Fix the frame in position and tighten the screws.
sentences.chinese: 把框子固定在正确位置上，拧紧螺丝。

sentences.english: The lens screws onto the front of the camera.
sentences.chinese: 镜头旋扣在照相机正面。

detailed_translations.english: a thin pointed piece of metal that you push and turn in order to fasten pieces of metal or wood together
to fasten or close something by turning it, or to be fastened in this way

sentences.english: People watched in horror as the plane crashed to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 人们惊恐地看着飞机坠落到地面上。

sentences.english: The thought of being left alone filled her with horror.
sentences.chinese: 想到被孤零零地留下，她就不寒而栗。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of great shock, fear or disgust

sentences.english: The hotel was absolutely terrible.
sentences.chinese: 这家宾馆糟糕透了。

sentences.english: I’d better write this down; I have a terrible memory.
sentences.chinese: 我最好把它记下来，我的记性很差。

sentences.english: You’re making a terrible mistake.
sentences.chinese: 你犯了一个极大的错误。

detailed_translations.english: very bad

sentences.english: Don’t cry, Laura. It’ll be OK.
sentences.chinese: 不要哭，劳拉，没事的。

sentences.english: Upstairs, a baby began to cry.
sentences.chinese: 楼上有个婴儿开始哭起来。

sentences.english: Jamie looked like he’d been crying.
sentences.chinese: 杰米看上去好像哭过了。

sentences.english: I just couldn’t stop crying.
sentences.chinese: 我就是哭个不停。

sentences.english: That film always makes me cry .
sentences.chinese: 那部影片总是让我落泪。

sentences.english: Oliver, alone, began to cry bitterly (= cry a lot ) .
sentences.chinese: 奥利弗独自一人，开始伤心地哭了。

sentences.english: ‘Stop!’ she cried.
sentences.chinese: “停下！”她喊道。

detailed_translations.english: to produce tears from your eyes, usually because you are unhappy or hurt

sentences.english: I’m a slow typist.
sentences.chinese: 我打字很慢。

detailed_translations.english: a secretary whose main job is to  type  letters

sentences.english: She tapped out a letter on the typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 她用打字机打出了一封信。

sentences.english: He tapped out an article on the typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 他用打字机打出了一篇文章。

sentences.english: The secretary transcribed those letters on the typewriter.
sentences.chinese: 秘书用打字机打出了那些信。

detailed_translations.english: a machine with keys that you press in order to print letters of the alphabet onto paper

sentences.english: Marie was sitting at her desk.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽正坐在书桌前。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of furniture like a table, usually with drawers in it, that you sit at to write and work

sentences.english: a video of baby’s first steps
sentences.chinese: 一盒婴儿学步的录像带

sentences.english: He took one step and fell.
sentences.chinese: 他走了一步就跌倒了。

sentences.english: I had to retrace my steps (= go back the way I came ) several times before I found the shop.
sentences.chinese: 我来回走了几次才找到那家商店。

sentences.english: This is the first step in reforming the welfare system.
sentences.chinese: 这是福利制度改革的第一步。

sentences.english: Jenny sat on the step in front of the house, waiting.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮坐在房前的台阶上等着。

sentences.english: I accidentally stepped in a puddle.
sentences.chinese: 我不小心踩进了水坑。

detailed_translations.english: the movement you make when you put one foot in front of or behind the other when walking
to bring your foot down on something

sentences.english: Some of his most powerful writing is based on his childhood experiences.
sentences.chinese: 他的一些最震慑人心的作品是根据儿时经历写成的。

detailed_translations.english: books, poems, articles etc, especially those by a particular writer or about a particular subject

sentences.english: She’s one of my favourite writers.
sentences.chinese: 她是我最喜欢的作家之一。

sentences.english: a science-fiction writer
sentences.chinese: 科幻小说作家

detailed_translations.english: someone who writes books, stories etc, especially as a job

sentences.english: He quickened his pace , longing to be home.
sentences.chinese: 他加快步伐，盼望着早点回到家中。

sentences.english: Traffic slowed to a walking pace.
sentences.chinese: 车流速度减缓，犹如步行。

sentences.english: I found Mark at the hospital, pacing restlessly up and down.
sentences.chinese: 我看见马克在医院里焦躁不安地踱来踱去。

detailed_translations.english: the speed at which someone walks, runs, or moves
to walk first in one direction and then in another many times, especially because you are nervous

sentences.english: She took a file from her desk drawer .
sentences.chinese: 她从书桌的抽屉里拿出了一个文件夹。

sentences.english: The scissors are in the kitchen drawer (= drawer in a piece of kitchen furniture ) .
sentences.chinese: 剪刀在厨房的抽屉里。

detailed_translations.english: part of a piece of furniture, such as a desk, that you pull out and push in and use to keep things in

sentences.english: He was a quiet shy man.
sentences.chinese: 他是个话不多、害羞的男人。

sentences.english: a shy smile
sentences.chinese: 羞怯的微笑

sentences.english: As a teenager, I was painfully shy (= extremely shy ) .
sentences.chinese: 我十几岁时害羞得很。

detailed_translations.english: nervous and embarrassed about meeting and speaking to other people, especially people you do not know
if a horse shies, it makes a sudden movement away from something because it is frightened

sentences.english: I endured the shyness and the pain of jealousness.
sentences.chinese: 我既忍受着羞怯，又忍受着嫉妒的折磨；

sentences.english: When my play was with thee I never questioned who thou wert. I knew nor shyness nor fear, my life was boisterous.
sentences.chinese: 当我是同你做游戏的时候，我从来没有问过你是谁．我不懂得羞怯和惧怕，我的生活是热闹的．

sentences.english: I sat down and took off my shoes and socks.
sentences.chinese: 我坐下来脱掉鞋子和袜子。

sentences.english: What size shoes do you take?
sentences.chinese: 你穿几号的鞋子？

detailed_translations.english: something that you wear to cover your feet, made of leather or some other strong material

sentences.english: He had enough money to pay off his outstanding debts.
sentences.chinese: 他有足够的钱偿还亏欠的债务。

sentences.english: students who run up huge debts
sentences.chinese: 欠下巨额债务的学生

detailed_translations.english: a sum of money that a person or organization owes

sentences.english: He used to buy them expensive presents, out of guilt.
sentences.chinese: 出于内疚，他以前总是给他们买昂贵的礼物。

sentences.english: He felt an enormous sense of guilt when he thought about how he’d treated her.
sentences.chinese: 他想到自己那样对待她，心里非常歉疚。

sentences.english: He did not deny his guilt.
sentences.chinese: 他没有否认自己有罪。

sentences.english: His guilt was proved beyond all doubt by the prosecution.
sentences.chinese: 他的罪行已被原告方证实确凿无疑。

detailed_translations.english: a strong feeling of shame and sadness because you know that you have done something wrong

sentences.english: How much do I owe you (= often used to show that you want to pay for something )?
sentences.chinese: 我该付你多少钱？

sentences.english: He owes his success to hard work.
sentences.chinese: 他的成功是靠勤奋工作。

detailed_translations.english: to need to pay someone for something that they have done for you or sold to you, or to need to give someone back money that they have lent you

sentences.english: She looked self-conscious and guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她看上去很不自然，很内疚的样子。

sentences.english: He was found not guilty of the death of PC Jones.
sentences.chinese: 关于警员琼斯的死，他被判无罪。

detailed_translations.english: feeling very ashamed and sad because you know that you have done something wrong

sentences.english: His mother always used to pick him up from school.
sentences.chinese: 他母亲以前一直去学校接他。

detailed_translations.english: a place where children are taught
to train or teach someone to have a certain skill, type of behaviour, or way of thinking

sentences.english: About 20 pupils study music here.
sentences.chinese: 大约20名小学生在这里学习音乐。

sentences.english: staff and pupils
sentences.chinese: 教职员工和学生

sentences.english: a star pupil
sentences.chinese: 一名优秀的小学生

sentences.english: a third-grade pupil
sentences.chinese: 一名三年级小学生

detailed_translations.english: someone who is being taught, especially a child

sentences.english: This headmaster is very modest.
sentences.chinese: 这位校长很谦虚。

sentences.english: Our headmaster rattled on for at least two hours at the opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 我们的校长在开学典礼上唠唠叨叨地讲了至少两个小时。

sentences.english: Before the door of the headmaster's office,she stopped and re-collected herself for a while.
sentences.chinese: 在校长办公室门前，她停步片刻使自己镇静下来。

detailed_translations.english: a male teacher who is in charge of a school

sentences.english: The residents are being asked to shoulder the costs of the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 居民们被要求承担这笔修理费用。

sentences.english: They shouldered the boat and took it down to the river.
sentences.chinese: 他们把船扛在肩上抬到河里。

detailed_translations.english: to accept a difficult or unpleasant responsibility, duty etc

sentences.english: a serving dish
sentences.chinese: 上菜用的盘子

sentences.english: an ovenproof dish
sentences.chinese: 耐热盘

sentences.english: The menu includes a wide selection of vegetarian dishes.
sentences.chinese: 菜单上有品种丰富的素食。

detailed_translations.english: a flat container with low sides, for serving food from or cooking food in

sentences.english: the protection of the environment
sentences.chinese: 环境保护

detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is protected

sentences.english: Are we doing enough to protect the environment?
sentences.chinese: 我们在保护环境方面做得够吗？

detailed_translations.english: to keep someone or something safe from harm, damage, or illness

sentences.english: The illness left her feeling weak.
sentences.chinese: 疾病使她感到身体虚弱。

sentences.english: Poor light produces weak plants.
sentences.chinese: 光照不足，植物就生长不好。

sentences.english: The animal was weak from loss of blood.
sentences.chinese: 那只动物因失血而虚弱无力。

detailed_translations.chinese: [经] 疲软的；虚弱的；无力的；不牢固的
detailed_translations.english: not physically strong

sentences.english: The legislation has a fundamental weakness.
sentences.chinese: 这项立法有一个根本性缺陷。

sentences.english: The plan has strengths and weaknesses.
sentences.chinese: 这个计划既有优点又有缺点。

sentences.english: muscular weakness

sentences.english: weakness in the economy
sentences.chinese: 经济疲软

detailed_translations.english: a fault in someone’s character or in a system, organization, design etc

sentences.english: Over the last two years the president’s position has weakened.
sentences.chinese: 过去两年来，总统的地位被削弱了。

sentences.english: Changes in policy have weakened the power of the trade unions.
sentences.chinese: 政策的变化削弱了工会的力量。

sentences.english: The absence of this witness has weakened the case against the accused.
sentences.chinese: 这名证人的缺席削弱了对被告的指控力度。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something less powerful or less important, or to become less powerful
to make someone or something less powerful or less important, or to become less powerful

sentences.english: Clean the rug by sponging it gently.
sentences.chinese: 用湿布轻轻擦洗以清洁小地毯。

detailed_translations.english: to put paint on a surface using a sponge
a piece of a soft natural or artificial substance full of small holes, which can suck up liquid and is used for washing

sentences.english: The dog wagged its tail .
sentences.chinese: 那条狗摇了摇尾巴。

detailed_translations.english: the part that sticks out at the back of an animal’s body, and that it can move

sentences.english: a black evening dress
sentences.chinese: 黑色晚礼服

sentences.english: It was still pitch black (= very dark ) out.
sentences.chinese: 外面依然一片漆黑。

detailed_translations.english: having the darkest colour, like coal or night

sentences.english: Sweden borders Norway and Finland.
sentences.chinese: 瑞典与挪威、芬兰接壤。

sentences.english: During a holiday in Sweden， I found this note on my car： 'sir， we welcome you to our city.
sentences.chinese: 有一次在瑞典度假，我发现我的车上有这样一个字条："先生，欢迎您光临我们的城市。

sentences.english: Why did you choose Sweden for the procedure?
sentences.chinese: 为什么你会选择在瑞典进行治疗

sentences.english: He kept pigs and poultry.
sentences.chinese: 他养过猪和家禽。

detailed_translations.english: a farm animal with short legs, a fat body and a curved tail. Pigs are kept for their meat, which includes  pork  ,  bacon  and  ham  .

sentences.english: pork chops
sentences.chinese: 猪排

detailed_translations.english: the meat from pigs

sentences.english: Ian came off the squash court dripping with sweat .
sentences.chinese: 伊恩大汗淋漓地离开壁球场。

sentences.english: Beads of sweat appeared on his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 他的额头上冒出了汗珠。

sentences.english: I was sweating a lot despite the air conditioning.
sentences.chinese: 尽管开着空调，我仍是满头大汗。

detailed_translations.english: drops of salty liquid that come out through your skin when you are hot, frightened, ill, or doing exercise
to have drops of salty liquid coming out through your skin because you are hot, ill, frightened, or doing exercise

sentences.english: The River Rhine rises in Switzerland.
sentences.chinese: 莱茵河发源于瑞士。

sentences.english: But I did not need to go to Switzerland to learn that.
sentences.chinese: 到瑞士要是就为了知道这些就大可不必去了。

sentences.english: The banks needed to do something, so they turned themselves into the Switzerland of the Gulf.
sentences.chinese: 银行必须做点什么，于是它们把迪拜变成了波斯湾地区的瑞士。

detailed_translations.chinese: 瑞士的；瑞士人的；瑞士风格的
detailed_translations.english: relating to Switzerland or its people
people from Switzerland

sentences.english: The wardrobe was too heavy for me to move on my own.
sentences.chinese: 衣橱太重，我一个人移不动。

sentences.english: a heavy suitcase
sentences.chinese: 沉重的手提箱

sentences.english: The males are seven times heavier than the females.
sentences.chinese: 雄性的重量是雌性的七倍。

sentences.english: Heavy rain has caused flooding in many areas.
sentences.chinese: 大雨在很多地区造成水灾。

sentences.english: The apple trees were heavy with fruit.
sentences.chinese: 苹果树上果实累累。

detailed_translations.english: weighing a lot

sentences.chinese: 失聪者和听力正常者之间的交流

sentences.english: I think Mum’s going a bit deaf .
sentences.chinese: 我觉得妈妈有点耳聋了。

sentences.english: She’s deaf and dumb (= unable to hear or speak ) and communicates using sign language.
sentences.chinese: 她又聋又哑，用手语交流。

sentences.english: She was deaf to his pleas.
sentences.chinese: 她对他的恳求充耳不闻。

detailed_translations.english: physically unable to hear anything or unable to hear well

sentences.english: He girded his sword on.
sentences.chinese: 他佩带上他的剑。

detailed_translations.english: a weapon with a long pointed blade and a handle

sentences.english: Janet and Abby are sisters.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮特和阿比是两姐妹。

sentences.english: He has two sisters and a brother.
sentences.chinese: 他有两个姊妹和一个弟弟。

sentences.english: She’s my twin sister .
sentences.chinese: 她是我的孪生妹妹。

sentences.english: ...the International Monetary Fund and its sister organization, the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: …国际货币基金组织和它的姐妹机构，世界银行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 姐妹；（称志同道合者）姐妹；修女；护士
detailed_translations.english: a girl or woman who has the same parents as you
You can use sister to describe something that is of the same type or is connected in some way to another thing you have mentioned. For example, if a company has a sister company, they are connected.

sentences.english: a difficult question
sentences.chinese: 难解的问题

sentences.english: an immensely difficult task
sentences.chinese: 极为艰巨的任务

sentences.english: Was the exam very difficult?
sentences.chinese: 这次考试很难吗？

sentences.english: It’s difficult to see how more savings can be made.
sentences.chinese: 想要进一步节约看来是很难了。

sentences.english: Don’t be so difficult!
sentences.chinese: 别这么挑剔！

detailed_translations.english: hard to do, understand, or deal with

sentences.english: They had great difficulty in finding a replacement.
sentences.chinese: 他们找接替的人费了很大劲

sentences.english: If you have any difficulties, give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 如果你遇到困难，就给我打电话。

sentences.english: She soon got into difficulty with debt.
sentences.chinese: 她很快就因债务陷入了困境。

detailed_translations.english: if you have difficulty doing something, it is difficult for you to do

sentences.english: They have a nice pool in their backyard.
sentences.chinese: 他们后院有个漂亮的游泳池。

sentences.english: a shallow pool suitable for children
sentences.chinese: 适合儿童的浅水池

sentences.english: pools of water with tiny fish in them
sentences.chinese: 有小鱼的一个个水池

detailed_translations.english: a hole or container that has been specially made and filled with water so that people can swim or play in it

sentences.english: I looked up at the clouds floating in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 我仰望着天上的浮云。

sentences.english: Leaves floated gently down from the trees.
sentences.chinese: 叶子从树上轻轻飘落。

detailed_translations.english: if something floats, it moves slowly through the air or stays up in the air

detailed_translations.chinese: 彩车，花车；漂流物；浮舟；浮萍
detailed_translations.english: a large vehicle that is decorated to drive through the streets as part of a special event

sentences.english: six months ago
sentences.chinese: 六个月前

sentences.english: She arrived just after six (= six o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 她六点刚过就到了。

sentences.english: He learnt to play the violin when he was six (= six years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 他六岁学拉小提琴。

detailed_translations.english: the number 6
the number 6

sentences.english: About one sixth of the children admitted to taking drugs.
sentences.chinese: 大约六分之一的儿童承认吸毒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 月的第六日，（与the连用的）第六个；六分之一
detailed_translations.english: one of six equal parts of something

detailed_translations.chinese: （与 the 连用）第六的，第六个的；六分之一的
detailed_translations.english: coming after five other things in a series

sentences.english: But it contained one very interesting piece of data: in 2008, for the first time in sixteen years, the finance and insurance industry shrank.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这份报告里有一项非常耐人寻味的数据：在2008年，金融保险业出现近十六年来的首次萎缩。

detailed_translations.english: the number

sentences.english: From the sixteenth of January to the seventh of February is our Winter Holiday.
sentences.chinese: 我们的寒假放假时间是从一月十六号截至到二月七日。

sentences.english: He became the sixteenth, and some say one of the greatest presidents this country ever had.
sentences.chinese: 他荣任第十六届美国总统，有些人说他是本世纪最伟大的总统之一。

detailed_translations.english: one of 16 equal parts of something
one of 16 equal parts of something

sentences.english: sixty years ago
sentences.chinese: 六十年前

detailed_translations.english: the number

detailed_translations.chinese: 第六十的；六十分之一的

sentences.english: the immortality of the soul
sentences.chinese: 灵魂的不灭

sentences.english: It was as if those grey eyes could see into the very depths of her soul .
sentences.chinese: 仿佛那双灰眼睛能看到她的灵魂深处。

sentences.english: the souls of the dead
sentences.chinese: 亡灵

detailed_translations.english: the part of a person that is not physical, and that contains their character, thoughts, and feelings. Many people believe that a person’s soul continues to exist after they have died.

sentences.english: The men emigrate to work as seamen.
sentences.chinese: 这些男人移居国外当海员。

detailed_translations.english: a  sailor  on a ship or in the navy who is not an officer

sentences.english: a yacht with white sails
sentences.chinese: 扬着白帆的游艇

sentences.chinese: 那只拖网渔船已经从泽布吕赫港启航。

detailed_translations.english: a large piece of strong cloth fixed onto a boat, so that the wind will push the boat along
to travel on or across an area of water in a boat or ship

sentences.english: But the towboat did look good. So did a sailing boat, packed with friends.
sentences.chinese: 但是拖船看起来确实不错，还有一艘乘满了朋友的帆船。

sentences.english: I am on a sailing boat of 18 metres.
sentences.chinese: 我在一艘18米的帆船上。

sentences.english: "Hydroptere," currently the world's fastest sailing boat, gets its speed from foils, or underwater "wings" that lift the boat and enable it to "fly" several meters above the water.
sentences.chinese: “Hydroptere”，目前世界上最快的帆船，它的速度来源于船底的薄片，或者说是它的”海洋之翼“，将船身托起，使它能“飞行”在水面数米之上。

detailed_translations.english: a small boat with one or more sails

sentences.english: The priest gave the blessing.
sentences.chinese: 牧师为大家祝福。

detailed_translations.english: protection and help from God, or words spoken to ask for this

detailed_translations.chinese: 使幸福（bless的ing形式）；使神圣化；为…祈神赐福

sentences.english: He’s always willing to help. Bless him!
sentences.chinese: 他一向乐于助人，愿上帝保佑他！

sentences.english: ‘Jess made this card for me.’ ‘Bless!’
sentences.chinese: “杰斯给我做了这张卡。”“真不错！”

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you are fond of someone, amused by them, or pleased by something they have done

sentences.english: The practice of hanging clothes across the street is a common sight in many parts of the city.
sentences.chinese: 在大街上晾晒衣服在该市的许多地区是很常见的景象。

detailed_translations.english: A sight is something that you see

sentences.english: You have plenty of time to read.
sentences.chinese: 你有大量的时间读书。

sentences.english: The new collections of custom furs around town reveal plenty of folderol, but there are practical things too.
sentences.chinese: 市上大批新的定做的皮衣中有许多是华而不实的， 但也有一些实用的东西。

sentences.english: As mentioned at the beginning, as mentors we have met a great many companies and some very talented individuals.
sentences.chinese: 正如开始提到的，作为咨询师，我们遇见过很多公司和一些非常有才能的人。

sentences.english: I think that I learned a great many lessons from how I observed Mr Yokoi training his subordinates, and I think in my position I use some of them.
sentences.chinese: 我认为我从观察横井先生如何训练他的属下方面学到了很多，今天我在我的位置上还会用到其中的一些方法。

sentences.english: And in our travels to many clients, we have been fortunate to have met a great many talented and dedicated individuals.
sentences.chinese: 在我们和许多客户的交往中，我们有幸遇到了很多有才能的和有奉献精神的人。

sentences.english: pure silk stockings
sentences.chinese: 生丝面料的漂亮连衣裙

detailed_translations.english: a thin smooth soft cloth made from very thin thread which is produced by a silkworm

sentences.english: The first silkworm diseases began to appear in 1845, creating an epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 1845年，首批桑蚕疾病开始出现，并引起了一次流行。

sentences.english: An epidemic of several silkworm diseases caused production to fall, especially in France, where the industry never recovered.
sentences.chinese: 而几种桑蚕疾病的流行导致了丝绸产品下滑，特别在法国，丝绸工业再也没有恢复。

detailed_translations.english: a type of  caterpillar  which produces silk thread

sentences.english: hot soapy water
sentences.chinese: 热肥皂水

detailed_translations.chinese: 涂着肥皂的；含有肥皂的；似肥皂的；圆滑的
detailed_translations.english: containing soap

sentences.english: They tied a rope around my waist and pulled me up.
sentences.chinese: 他们在我腰间系了一根粗绳子，把我拉了上去。

sentences.english: The man was coiling a length of rope.
sentences.chinese: 那人正在卷一段绳子。

detailed_translations.english: very strong thick string, made by twisting together many thinner strings
to tie things together using rope

sentences.english: Don’t disturb me while I’m working.
sentences.chinese: 我工作的时候不要打扰我。

sentences.english: Gemma was reading.
sentences.chinese: 吉玛正在看书。

sentences.english: They’ve been asking a lot of questions.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经问了许多问题。

sentences.english: That guy’s always causing trouble.
sentences.chinese: 那家伙总是惹麻烦。

sentences.english: We’ll be starting in about an hour.
sentences.chinese: 我们过一小时左右开始。

sentences.english: He isn’t leaving, is he?
sentences.chinese: 他不会走吧？

detailed_translations.english: used with a present participle to form the  continuous 4  tenses of verbs

sentences.english: a law that first came into being in 1912
sentences.chinese: 于1912年制定的一条法律

sentences.english: human beings
sentences.chinese: 人

detailed_translations.english: existence

sentences.english: He took my hand in his.
sentences.chinese: 他握住我的手。

detailed_translations.english: of or belonging to him

name: his son is a great trouble to him

sentences.english: I have distrusted her ever since she cheated me.
sentences.chinese: 自从她骗我以后，我就不信任她了。

sentences.english: And she sat and sat on that aluminum throne ever since.
sentences.chinese: 自那以后，她就一直坐在那个铝制的宝座上。

detailed_translations.english: continuously since the time mentioned

sentences.english: Fuel is cheaper on the French side of the border.
sentences.chinese: 燃料在边境那边的法国要便宜些。

sentences.english: A man stood watching me from the other side of the road.
sentences.chinese: 有个男人站在马路的对面看着我。

sentences.english: His friends and family were all on the other side of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他的朋友和家人都在地球的另一边。

sentences.english: The restaurant was empty apart from another couple on the far side of the room (= the area that is furthest away from you ) .
sentences.chinese: 饭店里空空的，只有最那边还有一对夫妇。

sentences.english: He is in charge of the civilian side of the UN mission.
sentences.chinese: 他在联合国使团中负责平民方面的事务。

sentences.english: Frank sided with David against their mother.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克站在戴维一边反对妈妈。

sentences.english: Hannah slipped out through a side exit.
sentences.chinese: 汉娜从一个侧门溜了出去。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two areas that are on the left or the right of an imaginary line, or on the left or the right of a border, wall, river etc
to support or argue against a person or group in a quarrel, fight etc
in or on the side of something

sentences.english: My secretary will fax you all the details.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会把所有的细节发传真给你。

sentences.english: the secretary of the tennis club
sentences.chinese: 网球俱乐部的干事

sentences.english: the Foreign Secretary
sentences.chinese: 外交大臣

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in an office typing letters, keeping records, answering telephone calls, arranging meetings etc

sentences.english: Any proposal must be seconded by two other members of the committee.
sentences.chinese: 任何提案须有委员会其他两位委员附议。

detailed_translations.english: to formally support a suggestion made by another person in a meeting

sentences.english: How can you be so selfish?
sentences.chinese: 你怎能这样自私？

sentences.english: selfish behaviour
sentences.chinese: 自私的行为

detailed_translations.english: caring only about yourself and not about other people – used to show disapproval

sentences.english: Well, she won, of course.
sentences.chinese: 噢，当然是她赢啦。

sentences.english: You should of course keep copies of all your correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 你当然应该保留所有信函的复印件。

sentences.english: Of course there will be some difficult times ahead.
sentences.chinese: 今后当然会有遇到困难的时候。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that other people probably already know what you are saying is true, or expect to hear it

sentences.english: This species of plant is becoming increasingly rare.
sentences.chinese: 这种植物越来越罕见。

sentences.english: I only saw Helen on the rare occasions when I went into her shop.
sentences.chinese: 我只有偶尔去海伦店里时才会见到她。

sentences.english: It is very rare for her to miss a day at school.
sentences.chinese: 她很少有哪一天不上学的。

detailed_translations.english: not seen or found very often, or not happening very often

sentences.english: We rarely see someone go after the health area.
sentences.chinese: 我们很少见到有人在健康领域做文章。

sentences.english: He rarely mingles with other students on the campus.
sentences.chinese: 他很少和校园里的其他学生交往。

sentences.english: Karen had seldom seen him so angry.
sentences.chinese: 卡伦很少见他这么生气过。

detailed_translations.english: very rarely or almost never

sentences.english: Teachers often feel overworked in term time (= during the term ) .
sentences.chinese: 教师在学期内经常觉得工作担子过重。

detailed_translations.chinese: 术语；学期；期限；条款；(代数式等的)项
detailed_translations.english: a word or expression with a particular meaning, especially one that is used for a specific subject or type of language
to use a particular word or expression to name or describe something

sentences.english: The product suddenly took off in September.
sentences.chinese: 该产品在九月份突然热销起来。

sentences.english: Do I remember that September afternoon when I first met you?
sentences.chinese: 还记不记得第一次遇见你的那个九月的下午？

sentences.english: The carmaker is almost ready to launch out a new model in September.
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造商将于九月投产新型汽车。

detailed_translations.english: the ninth month of the year, between August and October

sentences.english: The waiter brought drinks on a tray.
sentences.chinese: 服务员用托盘端来饮料。

sentences.english: a cat litter tray
sentences.chinese: 猫砂盘

detailed_translations.english: a flat piece of plastic, metal, or wood, with raised edges, used for carrying things such as plates, food etc

sentences.english: She was sitting in an armchair with blankets wrapped around her.
sentences.chinese: 她当时正裹着毯子坐在一把扶手椅里。

detailed_translations.english: a comfortable chair with sides that you can rest your arms on

sentences.english: One likes to do it oneself.
sentences.chinese: 人都喜欢亲自去做。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize one

sentences.english: Teachers have no choice but to take measures to protect themselves.
sentences.chinese: 教师们别无选择，只能采取措施来保护自己。

sentences.english: Our neighbours have just bought themselves a jacuzzi.
sentences.chinese: 我们邻居刚刚买了一个按摩浴缸。

sentences.english: The kids seem very pleased with themselves.
sentences.chinese: 那些孩子好像自得其乐。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that the people who do something are affected by their own action

sentences.english: The business of life is to enjoy oneself.
sentences.chinese: 生活的内容就是快快乐乐地过日子。

sentences.english: I want you be pround of me. I hope you enjoy oneself.
sentences.chinese: 我想让您因我而自豪。我希望你能过得快乐！

sentences.english: For many the philosophy was merely a fashion, and the novelty soon wore off.
sentences.chinese: 对很多人而言这种哲学只是一时时髦，新鲜感很快就消失了。

detailed_translations.english: If a drug, sensation, or feeling wears off, it disappears slowly until it no longer exists or has any effect

sentences.english: The new rocket was extensively tested and debugged by the army.
sentences.chinese: 这种新式火箭由军方进行了广泛的测试和调试。

sentences.english: Dr Alloway, from the University of Stirling in Scotland, has extensively studied working memory and believes it to be far more important to success and happiness than IQ.
sentences.chinese: 来自苏格兰的斯特灵大学阿洛韦博士，已经广泛的研究“工作记忆”，并认为它是比智商更为重要对于成功和幸福来说。

sentences.english: Residents are complaining because traffic in the area has increased.
sentences.chinese: 由于这个地区的交通流量有所增加，居民都在抱怨。

sentences.english: ‘You never ask my opinion about anything,’ Rod complained.
sentences.chinese: “你什么事都不问问我的看法。”罗德抱怨道。

sentences.english: Employees complained bitterly about working conditions.
sentences.chinese: 雇员们对工作条件十分不满。

detailed_translations.english: to say that you are annoyed, not satisfied, or unhappy about something or someone

sentences.english: She behaved in a very responsible way .
sentences.chinese: 她表现得很有责任心。

sentences.english: I couldn't believe these people were behaving in this way.
sentences.chinese: 我无法相信这些人竟这样行事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表现，举止；运转，做出反应
detailed_translations.english: to do things that are good, bad, sensible etc
The way that you behave is the way that you do and say things, and the things that you do and say

sentences.english: a course for students wishing to improve their English
sentences.chinese: 为想提高英语水平的学生开设的一门课

sentences.english: The doctors say she is improving (= after being ill ).
sentences.chinese: 医生说她正在康复。

sentences.english: You could use the money for improving your home.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用这笔钱改善家居。

sentences.english: Many wines improve with age (= get better as they get older ).
sentences.chinese: 很多葡萄酒年代越久越香醇。

detailed_translations.english: to make something better, or to become better
to make something better, or to become better

sentences.english: We need to apply for planning permission to build a garage.
sentences.chinese: 我们建车库需要申请规划许可。

sentences.english: In his speech, he referred to a recent trip to Canada.
sentences.chinese: 在他的讲话中，他提到了最近的加拿大之行。

sentences.english: He gave the speech without referring to his notes.
sentences.chinese: 他脱稿发表了演讲。

detailed_translations.english: to mention or speak about someone or something

sentences.english: My daughter-in-law said that I was interfering, but I was only trying to help.
sentences.chinese: 我的儿媳说我多管闲事，但我只是想帮忙。

detailed_translations.english: to deliberately get involved in a situation where you are not wanted or needed

sentences.english: Investigators are still trying to determine the cause of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 调查人员仍在设法弄清失火的原因。

detailed_translations.english: to find out the facts about something

sentences.english: Today you may rejoice because of contacts, news or visits from friends who live in another city or country.
sentences.chinese: 今天您可能因为得到来自另一个城市或国家的朋友的联系、消息或拜访而感到高兴。

sentences.english: Why is it that we rejoice at a birth and grieve at a funeral? Is it because we are not the person concerned?
sentences.chinese: 我们为何在（人家）出生之时高兴而在殡殓之时又悲伤呢？是否因为我们不属于关人士才这样的？

sentences.english: After a few days of fever, she began to recover.
sentences.chinese: 发烧几天之后，她开始恢复。

sentences.english: Two bodies were recovered from the wreckage.
sentences.chinese: 残骸中找到了两具尸体

detailed_translations.english: to get better after an illness, accident, shock etc

sentences.english: Do you remember Rosa Davies?
sentences.chinese: 你记得罗莎·戴维斯吗？

sentences.english: I can’t remember her exact words.
sentences.chinese: 我记不得她的原话了。

sentences.english: I remember it well ; I’d never seen my mother so angry.
sentences.chinese: 这件事我记得很清楚；我从未见过母亲这么生气。

sentences.english: She clearly remembers the excitement as they boarded the train.
sentences.chinese: 她清楚地记得他们登上火车时的激动心情。

sentences.english: I vaguely remember reading something about it in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 我隐约记得在报纸上看到过有关情况。

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.english: I hope he remembers the wine.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他记得带酒。

detailed_translations.english: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past

sentences.english: I am writing to confirm /enquire/inform you…
sentences.chinese: 我写信是要确认/询问/通知你…

sentences.english: I recently e-mailed one website to enquire why my goods had not yet arrived.
sentences.chinese: 我最近给一个网站发邮件去询问为什么我订购的商品还没有到达。

sentences.english: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter, enquire who in it is worthy; and there abide till ye go thence.
sentences.chinese: 你们无论进那一城，那一村，要打听那里谁是好人，就住在他家，直住到走的时候。

sentences.english: ‘Why are you doing that?’ the boy inquired.
sentences.chinese: “你为什么这么做？”男孩问道。

sentences.english: Toby would have liked to inquire further (= ask more questions ).
sentences.chinese: 托比本想问更多的问题。

sentences.english: The investigation will inquire into the company’s financial dealings.
sentences.chinese: 此次调查将会涉及公司的财务往来。

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone for information

sentences.english: These conditions no longer obtain.
sentences.chinese: 这些状况已不复存在。

detailed_translations.chinese: 通用， 流行； 存在
detailed_translations.english: if a situation, system, or rule obtains, it continues to exist
to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work

sentences.english: She moved back home to care for her elderly parents.
sentences.chinese: 她搬回家住，好照料年迈的双亲。

detailed_translations.english: to look after sb who is sick, very old, very young, etc

sentences.english: What are they going to do now, I wonder ?
sentences.chinese: 我想知道，他们现在打算怎么办呢？

sentences.english: He’s been leaving work early a lot – it makes you wonder , doesn’t it?
sentences.chinese: 他最近经常提早下班——让人觉得奇怪，是不是？

detailed_translations.english: to think about something that you are not sure about and try to guess what is true, what will happen etc

sentences.english: I am feeling very depressed.
sentences.chinese: 我感到很沮丧。

sentences.english: Suddenly I felt a sharp pain in my shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 我突然感到肩部一阵剧痛。

sentences.english: I felt as if all my strength had gone.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得好象自己的力气已经全没了。

sentences.english: I felt like I was being kicked in the teeth every day.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉我好像每天都在经受挫折。

detailed_translations.english: If you feel a particular emotion or physical sensation, you experience it
to give you a particular physical feeling, especially when you touch or hold something

sentences.english: We could hear the neighbours arguing.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到邻居在争吵。

detailed_translations.english: to disagree with someone in words, often in an angry way
to persuade someone to do or not do something

sentences.english: He studied his map, trying to memorize the way to Rose's street.
sentences.chinese: 他研究了地图，努力记住去罗丝家那条街的路。

detailed_translations.english: to learn words, music etc so that you know them perfectly

sentences.english: And why should anyone be interested in listening to our cough?
sentences.chinese: 凭什么会有人感兴趣来听我们的咳嗽呢？

sentences.english: We would not be interested in human beings if we did not have the hope of someday meeting someone worse off than ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们没有在某天碰到某位比我们更糟糕的人，这种念头的话，我们还会对人类感兴趣吗？

sentences.english: Many people in the organization or community would be interested in these documents, so you need a way to manage such users and their access.
sentences.chinese: 组织或社区中的很多人都可能对这些文档感兴趣，所以需要有一种方式来管理那些用户和他们的访问。

sentences.english: I love looking after the children.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢照顾孩子们。

detailed_translations.english: If you look after someone or something, you do what is necessary to keep them healthy, safe, or in good condition

sentences.english: He decided to adopt a different approach and teach the Bible through story-telling.
sentences.chinese: 他决定采用一种不同的方法，通过讲故事来教授《圣经》。

sentences.english: This book takes an unorthodox approach to art criticism.
sentences.chinese: 这本书采用的是非传统的艺术评论方法。

sentences.english: organizations which take a positive approach to creative thinking
sentences.chinese: 对创造性思维采取积极态度的组织

detailed_translations.english: a method of doing something or dealing with a problem

sentences.english: Free school lunches are given to children who qualify.
sentences.chinese: 符合条件的儿童可获得免费的学生午餐。

detailed_translations.english: to have the right to have or do something, or to give someone this right

sentences.english: Tillicum: I long for freedom, if only for a while.
sentences.chinese: 蒂利克姆：我渴望自由，哪怕只有一段时间。

sentences.english: He’s been a constant source of worry .
sentences.chinese: 他总是让人担心。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being anxious about something
to be anxious or unhappy about someone or something, so that you think about them a lot

sentences.english: I wish you two would stop quarreling.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你们两个别再吵了。

sentences.english: Jacob left after a quarrel with his wife.
sentences.chinese: 雅各布和妻子吵了一架后走了。

detailed_translations.english: to have an argument
an angry argument or disagreement

sentences.english: The book is divided into six sections.
sentences.chinese: 本书分为六部分。

sentences.english: The money will be divided equally among the charities.
sentences.chinese: 这笔钱将被平分给各慈善机构。

detailed_translations.english: if something divides, or if you divide it, it separates into two or more parts

sentences.english: The two systems differ in many respects.
sentences.chinese: 这两个系统在许多方面不同。

sentences.english: Experts have differing views on the subject.
sentences.chinese: 在这个问题上专家们意见不同。

detailed_translations.english: to be different from something in some way

sentences.english: Therefore, we are not to rely on feelings, but to have faith in the facts.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们不能依靠我们的感觉，而是要将信心建立在事实上。

sentences.english: But what of the resources we rely on to sustain and develop our technology?
sentences.chinese: 但是我们依靠什么资源来支持和发展我们的科技？

sentences.english: However, many objects rely on other objects or layers of infrastructure.
sentences.chinese: 然而，许多对象依赖基础结构的其它对象或层。

sentences.english: Imagine that you have just won a million pounds.
sentences.chinese: 设想你刚刚赢得一百万英镑。

sentences.english: He didn’t quite dare to imagine himself as a real artist.
sentences.chinese: 他不太敢把自己想象成一个真正的艺术家。

detailed_translations.english: to form a picture or idea in your mind about what something could be like

sentences.english: Those jeans need a good wash (= a thorough wash ).
sentences.chinese: 那条牛仔裤要好好洗一洗了。

sentences.english: I’ll just have a quick wash before we go out.
sentences.chinese: 我很快洗个澡，然后我们就出门。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗涤；洗的衣服；化妆水；冲积物
detailed_translations.english: an act of cleaning something using soap and water
to clean something using water and a type of soap

sentences.english: At the age when most people retire, he is ready to face a new career.
sentences.chinese: 在大多数人退休的年纪，他准备要面对一项新事业。

sentences.english: I retired late that evening.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上我睡得晚。

detailed_translations.english: to stop working, usually because you have reached a certain age

sentences.english: I felt certain that I’d passed the test.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉自己肯定通过这次测验了。

sentences.english: Many people look certain to lose their jobs.
sentences.chinese: 许多人看来肯定要失业了。

detailed_translations.english: confident and sure, without any doubts

sentences.english: You shouldn’t travel alone, for safety’s sake .
sentences.chinese: 为安全起见，不要独自一人旅行。

sentences.english: For your own safety , please do not smoke inside the plane.
sentences.chinese: 为了您自身的安全，请不要在飞机上吸烟。

detailed_translations.chinese: 安全；保险；安全设备；保险装置；安打
detailed_translations.english: when someone or something is safe from danger or harm

sentences.english: Such sinners will surely be punished.
sentences.chinese: 这样的罪人必定会受到惩罚。

detailed_translations.chinese: 当然；无疑；坚定地；稳当地
detailed_translations.english: certainly

sentences.english: You could always ask Beth – she’s got plenty of money.
sentences.chinese: 你总是可以去问贝丝——她有很多钱。

sentences.english: I saw you talking to that girl. Who is she?
sentences.chinese: 我看见你和那个女孩子说话。 她是谁？

sentences.english: What did she say when you told her?
sentences.chinese: 你告诉她时她怎么说？

detailed_translations.chinese: 她（主格）；它（用来指雌性动物或国家、船舶、地球、月亮等）
detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about
used to refer to a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned or is already known about

sentences.english: Bob and Sue said they wouldn’t be able to come.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃和休说他们来不了。

sentences.english: Ken gave me some flowers. Aren’t they beautiful?
sentences.chinese: 肯送给我一些花。很漂亮吧？

sentences.english: They all want to come to the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 他们都想来参加婚礼。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to two or more people or things that have already been mentioned or are already known about

sentences.english: On the seventh day of Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 在圣诞节的第七天。

sentences.english: Ash wednesday: the seventh wednesday before easter and the first day of lent on which many christians receive a mark of ashes on the forehead as a token of penitence and mortality.
sentences.chinese: 圣灰星期三，大斋首日：复活节前第七个星期三和大斋期的第一天，在这一天很多基督教都用灰在前额画一标记以作忏悔和必死的标志。

sentences.english: Libra is the seventh of the zodiac signs.
sentences.chinese: 天秤座是黄道十二宫的第七宫。

detailed_translations.english: one of seven equal parts of something
one of seven equal parts of something

sentences.english: The women visited cities in seven states.
sentences.chinese: 这些女性访问了七个州的城市。

sentences.english: We close the store at seven (= seven o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们商店七点关门。

sentences.english: ‘How old’s Sam?’ ‘He’s seven (= seven years old ) .’
sentences.chinese: “萨姆多大了？”“他七岁。”

detailed_translations.english: the number 7
the number 7

sentences.english: a group of seventeen American military officers
sentences.chinese: 由17名美国军官组成的团体

sentences.english: I left home when I was seventeen (= 17 years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 我17岁时离开家。

detailed_translations.english: the number 17

detailed_translations.chinese: 十七岁的；十七的，十七个的

detailed_translations.english: the number 17

sentences.english: The seventeenth to Hezir, the eighteenth to Aphses.
sentences.chinese: 第十七是希悉，第十八是哈辟悉。

sentences.english: Third was the development of an international state system in Europe in the seventeenth century and its spread and adoption by nations on every continent.
sentences.chinese: 再次就是公元十七世纪欧洲各国国家体制的变化发展以及它的广泛传播并被各大洲的国家所借鉴。

sentences.english: We lost touch during the seventies.
sentences.chinese: 我们在70年代失去了联系。

detailed_translations.chinese: 七十；七十个；七十岁；七十年代
detailed_translations.english: the number 70

detailed_translations.chinese: 七十的；七十个的；七十岁的

detailed_translations.english: the number 70

sentences.english: He even produced the White House concert in celebration of jazz musician Duke Ellington's seventieth birthday in nineteen sixty-nine.
sentences.chinese: 1969年，他甚至在白宫主办了一次音乐会，纪念爵士音乐家杜克.埃林顿七十岁诞辰。

sentences.english: a democracy that produced Socrates and allowed him to philosophize freely until his seventieth year.
sentences.chinese: 毕竟是民主哺育了苏格拉底,并允许他自由地进行哲思,直到他七十岁为止。

sentences.english: Tyler was past his seventieth birthday when his 15th child was born.
sentences.chinese: 泰勒总统七十岁生日时，他第十五个孩子降生了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 第七十的；七十分之一的

sentences.english: early settlers in Australia
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚的早期移民

detailed_translations.english: someone who goes to live in a country or area where not many people like them have lived before, and that is a long way from any towns or cities

sentences.english: He pressed the red alarm signal to see if it was on or off.
sentences.chinese: 他按了一下红色报警信号钮，检查一下它是开著的还是关著的。

detailed_translations.english: important
a sound or action that you make in order to give information to someone or tell them to do something
to make a sound or action in order to give information or tell someone to do something

sentences.english: The silver spoon tarnished.
sentences.chinese: 银匙失去光泽了。

sentences.english: Her teeth were capped with silver.
sentences.chinese: 她的牙齿是包了银的。

sentences.english: The workers parted gold from silver in the workshop.
sentences.chinese: 在车间里工人们把金子从银子中提炼出来。

sentences.english: her silvery hair
sentences.chinese: 她的银发

sentences.english: the silvery light of the moon
sentences.chinese: 银色的月光

detailed_translations.english: shiny and silver in colour

sentences.english: Cats have a very acute sense of hearing (= very good, so that they can hear even the smallest sound ) .
sentences.chinese: 猫的听觉非常敏锐。

sentences.english: Employees need the sense of being appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 雇员需要被赏识的感觉。

sentences.english: It was dark and he had completely lost his sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 天黑了，他完全失去了方向感。

sentences.english: This is true in a general sense.
sentences.chinese: 从一般意义上来讲，这是对的。

sentences.english: Perhaps he sensed your distrust.
sentences.chinese: 也许他感觉到了你的不信任。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感官；感觉；理解力；判断力；意义
detailed_translations.english: one of the five natural powers of sight, hearing, feeling, taste, and smell, that give us information about the things around us
if you sense something, you feel that it exists or is true, without being told or having proof

sentences.english: I was in the back seat and Jo was driving.
sentences.chinese: 我在后座，乔开车。

sentences.english: a 10,000-seat stadium
sentences.chinese: 万人体育场

sentences.english: People were shifting in their seats, looking uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 人们在座位上动来动去，看上去不大自在。

sentences.english: He waved toward a chair, and seated himself at the desk.
sentences.chinese: 他朝一把椅子一挥手，在桌旁坐了下来。

detailed_translations.english: a place where you can sit, especially one in a vehicle or one from which you watch a performance, sports event etc

detailed_translations.chinese: 使…坐下；可容纳…的；使就职
detailed_translations.english: If you seat yourself somewhere, you sit down

sentences.english: We sat on a park bench.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐在公园的长椅上。

detailed_translations.english: a long seat for two or more people, especially outdoors

sentences.english: A structural survey revealed the full scale of the damage.
sentences.chinese: 结构检验揭示了实际受损程度。

sentences.english: I was shocked by the sheer scale (= very big scale ) of the destruction.
sentences.chinese: 破坏程度之大让我大为震惊。

sentences.english: Large firms benefit from economies of scale (= ways of saving money because they are big ) .
sentences.chinese: 大公司从规模经济中得益。

detailed_translations.chinese: 大小，规模；等级，级别；天平，磅秤；比例；刻度，标度；鳞
detailed_translations.english: the size or level of something, or the amount that something is happening
to climb to the top of something that is high and difficult to climb

sentences.english: ski slopes
sentences.chinese: 滑雪坡

sentences.english: a ski resort (= where people can go skiing )
sentences.chinese: 滑雪度假胜地

sentences.english: ...the Swiss ski resort of Klosters.
sentences.chinese: …瑞士的克洛斯特斯滑雪胜地。

sentences.english: ...a private ski instructor.
sentences.chinese: …一位私人滑雪教练。

detailed_translations.english: one of a pair of long thin narrow pieces of wood or plastic that you fasten to your boots and use for moving on snow or on water
to move on skis for sport or in order to travel on snow or water
You use ski to refer to things that are concerned with skiing

sentences.english: a slave to fashion
sentences.chinese: 时尚的奴隶

detailed_translations.english: someone who is owned by another person and works for them for no money
to work very hard with little time to rest

sentences.english: attempts to abolish slavery
sentences.chinese: 废除奴隶制的努力

detailed_translations.english: the system of having slaves

sentences.chinese: 有一次，一个男孩子发表了一点意见，她就挥拳猛击他。

sentences.chinese: 他从沙发上猛然跳了起来。

detailed_translations.english: used to describe someone or something that has been given a name that you think is wrong

sentences.english: All four victims died instantly.
sentences.chinese: 四名受害人全部当即死亡。

sentences.english: The information was instantly available.
sentences.chinese: 信息即时可得。

detailed_translations.english: immediately

sentences.chinese: 她的儿子肖恩出生于 1983 年。

sentences.english: They have three sons and a daughter.
sentences.chinese: 他们有三个儿子和一个女儿。

sentences.english: In those days, the property went to the oldest son.

detailed_translations.english: someone’s male child

sentences.english: How dared they do such a thing?
sentences.chinese: 他们怎么敢做出这样的事?

sentences.english: He would not succumb to such an item.
sentences.chinese: 他不会对这样的条款做出让步的。

detailed_translations.english: used to show that you think that something is not good enough or that there is not enough of it

sentences.english: A British soldier was wounded in the fighting.
sentences.chinese: 战斗中，有一名英国士兵受了伤。

sentences.english: an enemy soldier
sentences.chinese: 敌兵

detailed_translations.english: a member of the army of a country, especially someone who is not an officer

detailed_translations.chinese: 当兵；磨洋工；坚持干；假称害病

sentences.english: We shall be away next week.
sentences.chinese: 我们下周要出去。

sentences.english: I shall have to be careful.
sentences.chinese: 我得当心。

sentences.english: I’ve never liked her and I never shall.
sentences.chinese: 我从来都不喜欢她，以后也不会。

sentences.english: We shall have finished by Friday.
sentences.chinese: 星期五前我们就能完成了。

detailed_translations.english: used to say what you will do in the future

sentences.english: You really ought to quit smoking.
sentences.chinese: 你真的应该把烟戒了。

sentences.english: The company ought to be making changes in its marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 公司应该在营销策略上作出改变了。

sentences.chinese: 应该学习的时候你却在外面玩。

sentences.chinese: 他不该这么自私。

sentences.chinese: 怎么竟然会有人意嫁给托尼？

sentences.chinese: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.chinese: 一束阳光

sentences.chinese: 我们享受了三天的春日阳光。

sentences.chinese: 温暖晴朗的一天

sentences.chinese: “请来两杯咖啡。”“还要别的吗？”“不要了，谢谢。

sentences.chinese: 她在澳大利亚和其他地方渐渐出名了。

sentences.chinese: 办公室里的冰箱因为不属于任何一个个人，没有人觉得自己有责任去管理或者照顾它，当然也没人在繁忙的工作时间抽出时间去做那些事情。

sentences.chinese: 这幅图画得非常用心。

sentences.chinese: 大多数受害者都出现了这样那样的心理问题。

sentences.chinese: 意大利面酱

sentences.chinese: …贫富差距。

sentences.chinese: 那 天早上，我从睡梦中醒来，发现自己的左脑疼痛不止，那种痛楚跟你咬冰淇淋的那种腐蚀性的感觉一样，它抓住我，然后又放开，然后再次抓住，再次放开。

sentences.chinese: 他和朋友在里茨饭店一起进餐。

sentences.chinese: 男孩们在后院里玩游戏。

sentences.chinese: 孩子们在互相追逐嬉闹。

sentences.chinese: 在操场上叫嚷奔跑的孩子们

sentences.chinese: 安妮正高兴地玩着玩具。

sentences.chinese: 那天他假装修剪灌木，却秘密地监视着她。

sentences.chinese: 一把山羊胡

detailed_translations.english: having a point at the end

sentences.chinese: 放鹰狩猎运动

sentences.chinese: 反对猎杀动物运动的人士举行的示威游行

detailed_translations.chinese: 运动；游戏；娱乐；运动会；玩笑

sentences.english: He’s a very keen sportsman .
sentences.chinese: 他是个非常喜爱运动的人。

sentences.english: a talented all-round sportsman
sentences.chinese: 一名有天赋的全能运动员

detailed_translations.english: a man who plays several different sports

sentences.chinese: 杰出的全能女运动员

sentences.chinese: 你能说几种语言？

sentences.chinese: 最著名的英语诗歌之一

sentences.chinese: 这些猫跳下来，过来迎接我们。

sentences.chinese: 尼克摇下窗子，啐了口唾沫。

the watery liquid that is produced in your mouth

sentences.chinese: 没有任何迹象表明在那以后有人进过这房间。

sentences.chinese: 彼得拉已完全没有德国口音。

sentences.chinese: 这些“费米大天区望远镜（LAT）”所侦测到的高能伽马射线的波长仅相当于原子核大小的千分之一。

sentences.english: As if that were not enough of an impact, sunscreens increasingly contain nanoparticles, smaller than one one-thousandth the diameter of a human hair.
sentences.chinese: 就像是怕以前作用还不够似的，现在防晒霜遮阳剂包含的纳米粒子越来越多，比人类头发直径的千分之一还小。

detailed_translations.chinese: 第一千的, 千分之一的

sentences.english: The plane taxied to a halt.
sentences.chinese: 飞机滑行一段距离后停下来。

sentences.english: Would you like a cup of tea or coffee?
sentences.chinese: 你想来一杯茶还是咖啡？

sentences.english: Do you take milk and sugar in your tea?
sentences.chinese: 你的茶里面要放牛奶和糖吗？

sentences.chinese: 我想要两杯茶和一块巧克力蛋糕。

sentences.english: For part of the day, you will be outside doing practical work.
sentences.chinese: 你们每天将有一部分时间在户外实际操作。

sentences.chinese: 开始组装模型之前把所有的零件都摆放出来。

sentences.english: the sub-atomic particles that make up matter

detailed_translations.english: a very small piece of something

sentences.chinese: 天气不好是造成坠机事故的部分原因。

sentences.chinese: 一知道我们在哪里，刘易斯就每隔几小时发一份电报来。

sentences.english: The president received a briefing by telegram.
sentences.chinese: 总裁收到了一份电报简报。

sentences.chinese: 他们用许多蜡烛照亮这个寺庙。

sentences.chinese: 整个山谷回荡着庙宇的钟声。

detailed_translations.english: if someone or something has a tendency to do or become a particular thing, they are likely to do or become it

sentences.english: Sofia was in the bedroom tending to her son.
sentences.chinese: 索菲娅在卧室里照料她的儿子。

sentences.chinese: 大楼里上上下下都铺了地毯。

detailed_translations.english: to cover a floor with carpet

sentences.chinese: 下星期二下午3点将召开一个会议。

sentences.english: Maybe by then you will have changed your mind.

detailed_translations.english: You use will to say that someone is willing to do something. You use will not or won't to indicate that someone refuses to do something.

sentences.english: the most expensive restaurant in town
sentences.chinese: 城里最贵的餐馆

sentences.chinese: 用错建筑工人有时会是代价高昂的错误。

detailed_translations.chinese: 虐待，折磨；（用扯碎机）扯碎；（替作家，律师等）做助手；抹辣味料烤制或煎煮

sentences.english: a chemistry text
sentences.chinese: 化学课本

detailed_translations.english: a textbook

sentences.english: an open-air theatre (= a theatre that is outside )

sentences.chinese: 水星剧院

sentences.chinese: 今晚的演出8点开始。

sentences.english: the performance of his official duties

sentences.chinese: 又深又窄的山谷

sentences.chinese: 她坐在一张很深的皮椅子里。

sentences.chinese: 这儿的水有多深？

sentences.chinese: 天文学家也许有一天可以到太空深处去。

sentences.chinese: 毛茸茸的小动物

sentences.chinese: 他像老虎一般地向我冲过来。

sentences.chinese: 或者老虎？

sentences.chinese: 请用黑色墨水书写。

sentences.chinese: 她有两个女儿和一个儿子。

sentences.chinese: …女厕所。

sentences.chinese: 用胶布贴在墙上的照片

sentences.chinese: 我有很多工作要做。

sentences.chinese: 身为父母，你的目标就是要培养孩子成为独立的成年人。

sentences.chinese: 我踢进了第一个球。

sentences.chinese: 我这辈子从没听到过这么愚蠢的话。

sentences.chinese: 她母亲去世十年了。

sentences.chinese: “你会让孩子们晚上单独外出吗？”“当然不行！”

sentences.chinese: 她为什么杀死丈夫？

sentences.chinese: 默里拿枪指着他的头并威胁要杀了他。

sentences.chinese: 火车冲进洪水泛滥的河中，造成四人身亡。

sentences.chinese: 漂白剂能够杀灭日常病菌。

sentences.english: Smoking kills.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟会致人死亡。

sentences.english: The out-of-town shopping centre will kill local trade.
sentences.chinese: 城外的购物中心将令本地商业难以为继。

sentences.chinese: 还有点时间可以消磨，于是他叫了一辆出租车去市中心。

sentences.chinese: 剑桥在夏季总是挤满了游客。

sentences.chinese: 晨报登载了纽约和华盛顿特区举行示威游行的报道。

sentences.chinese: 全国电视网播出宗教节目。

detailed_translations.english: if a newspaper, a television or radio broadcast, or a website carries a piece of news, an advertisement etc, it prints it or broadcasts it

sentences.chinese: 铁牛是拖拉机的别名。

sentences.chinese: 拖拉机把肥料拉走了。

sentences.chinese: 除了拖拉机， 我们又添了一台插秧机。

sentences.english: The children were all in tears .
sentences.chinese: 孩子们全都哭了。

sentences.english: She came home in floods of tears .
sentences.chinese: 她泪流满面地回到家里。

sentences.chinese: 我看到萨姆都快哭了。

sentences.chinese: 布里奇特突然大哭着跑了出去。

sentences.chinese: 他一边说，一边拼命忍住泪水。

sentences.english: A lot of people were moved to tears by his story.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都被他的故事感动得落泪。

sentences.chinese: 他亲了亲她的脸，这个举动让她热泪盈眶。

sentences.chinese: 我必须承认，学校关闭时我掉过几滴眼泪。

sentences.chinese: 那天我看到成年男子都流下了眼泪。

sentences.chinese: “请别那么说。”埃伦恳求道，眼里噙满泪水。

sentences.chinese: 此时，我已泪流满面。

sentences.english: The tears he shed were tears of joy .
sentences.chinese: 他淌下的是喜悦的泪水。

sentences.chinese: 他们喝了一瓶葡萄酒。

sentences.chinese: 他们俩把身上的钱都喝光了。

sentences.english: a bunch of grapes
sentences.chinese: 一串葡萄

sentences.english: grape juice
sentences.chinese: 葡萄汁

sentences.english: red seedless grapes
sentences.chinese: 红色无籽葡萄

detailed_translations.english: one of a number of small round green or purple fruits that grow together on a  vine . Grapes are often used for making wine

sentences.english: I had lots of dreams last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我做了很多梦。

sentences.english: Her dream is to make a movie.
sentences.chinese: 她的梦想是要拍一部电影。

sentences.chinese: 梦到自己坠落是常有的事。

sentences.chinese: 这种关系对我一直都很重要，失去它让我感到难过而空虚。

sentences.chinese: 我为朱莉的婚姻处于破裂的边缘感到难过。

sentences.chinese: 认识他的那些人都为他的去世感到难过。

sentences.chinese: 他的声音里含着一丝悲伤。

sentences.english: His relief was tinged with sadness (= he also felt rather sad ) .
sentences.chinese: 他的欣慰中带着一丝哀伤。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分离，分开；间隔，距离；[法] 分居；缺口
detailed_translations.english: when something separates or is separate

sentences.chinese: 小男孩咚咚地跑下楼梯。

sentences.chinese: 衣箱一路颠跳着滚下楼梯。

sentences.english: The children pattered down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们啪嗒啪嗒地跑下楼梯。

sentences.english: He kicked the door hard.
sentences.chinese: 他用力踢门。

sentences.english: The boys were kicking a ball around in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在院子里踢球。

sentences.english: She gave him a kick on the shin.
sentences.chinese: 她朝他的小腿踢了一脚。

sentences.english: a faithful friend
sentences.chinese: 忠诚的朋友

sentences.chinese: 为公司多年忠诚的服务

sentences.chinese: 我家的忠犬博吉

sentences.chinese: 教会的忠实信徒

sentences.chinese: 对所发生之事的如实报道

detailed_translations.english: without water or liquid inside or on the surface

sentences.chinese: 对一些女人来说，这会导致性欲或性兴奋下降、阴道干燥或难以到达高潮。

sentences.chinese: 一面低音大鼓

sentences.chinese: 5加仑的油桶

sentences.chinese: 找个特殊的钻头，钻个尺寸合适的孔。

sentences.chinese: 两国都同意撤军。

sentences.chinese: 请你帮我开门好吗？

sentences.chinese: 乌纳塔恩家族的一名成员，来自土耳其，他们中的一些人四肢着地走路。

sentences.chinese: 我听到钟敲了六下。

sentences.chinese: 疾病迅速在整个欧洲蔓延开来。

sentences.chinese: 他们达成协议，平分利润。

sentences.chinese: 下水道被淹，水溢到了大街上。

sentences.chinese: 威尔士：不，一点也不。

sentences.chinese: 不，一点儿也没有。我很欣赏你的诚实。

sentences.chinese: 140 名乘客中只有 12 人生还。

sentences.chinese: 后天开始干这活吧。

sentences.chinese: 她说，拆除行动可能就在今天、明天或者后天，具体日期她无法得知。

sentences.chinese: 他那奇怪的问题令她感到意外。

sentences.chinese: 我不知道你们俩认识。 尽管如此，我并不感到意外。

sentences.chinese: 最令我感到意外的是，她好像毫不在乎。

sentences.chinese: 她告诉我一件令人吃惊的事。

sentences.chinese: 他的存世画作多得出奇。

sentences.chinese: 初为人母者常患上抑郁症是不足为奇的。

sentences.chinese: 他很轻易就被说服了。

sentences.chinese: 费尽了口舌才让他接受。

sentences.chinese: 她使尽浑身解数，才劝服蒂莉应该那么做。

sentences.english: Poetry doesn’t usually translate well.
sentences.chinese: 诗歌通常都译不好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 翻译；转化；解释；转变为；调动
detailed_translations.english: to change written or spoken words into another language

sentences.chinese: 作者发现翻译者偷偷在他的原著中插入了几段文章。

detailed_translations.english: someone who changes writing into a different language

sentences.chinese: 她看了信，给我们大概翻译了一下。

sentences.english: I’ve only read ‘Madame Bovary’ in translation (= not in its original language ) .
sentences.chinese: 我只读过《包法利夫人》的翻译本。

sentences.english: Much of the book’s humour has been lost in translation (= is no longer effective when translated ) .

sentences.english: He struggled to overcome his shyness.
sentences.chinese: 他努力克服自己的羞怯。

sentences.english: Her financial problems could no longer be overcome.
sentences.chinese: 她的经济困难再也无法解决。

sentences.english: Australia overcame the Netherlands 2-1.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚队2比1战胜了荷兰队。

detailed_translations.english: to successfully control a feeling or problem that prevents you from achieving something

sentences.english: Although I soon convinced him of my innocence, I think he still has serious doubts about my sanity.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我很快就使他相信我是清白的，但是他还是非常怀疑我精神是否正常。

sentences.chinese: 这解释合情合理，只是他的语气不坚定。

sentences.english: It took her so much effort to speak that what she said carried great conviction (= showed she felt sure of what she said ) .
sentences.chinese: 她费了很大的劲在说，因此说出来的话显得很确定。

sentences.english: They had no previous convictions.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有前科。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being sure about something and having no doubts

sentences.chinese: 芭芭拉以惯有的热情作了回答。

sentences.english: Make a cheese sauce in the usual way.
sentences.chinese: 按通常的做法做奶酪酱。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you at the usual time.
sentences.chinese: 我在老时间和你碰头。

sentences.english: She ate twice as much as usual.
sentences.chinese: 她吃了平时食量两倍的东西。

sentences.chinese: 女人通常比男人长寿。

sentences.english: Usually I wear black, grey, or brown.
sentences.chinese: 通常我都穿黑色、灰色或者棕色的衣服。

sentences.english: The drive usually takes 15 or 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 这段车程通常需要 15 或 20 分钟。

detailed_translations.english: used to talk about what happens on most occasions or in most situations

sentences.english: Sorry, I can’t spare the time.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我抽不出时间。

sentences.english: Have you got any spare boxes?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有多余的盒子？

sentences.english: You could sleep in the spare bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 你可以睡那间空着的客房。

sentences.english: Do you have any spare cash?
sentences.chinese: 你手头有闲钱吗？

sentences.english: I’ll go and see if there are any spare seats.
sentences.chinese: 我去看看是否还有空余的座位。

sentences.english: A decline in beer sales had left the industry with spare capacity (= the ability to produce more than can be sold ) .
sentences.chinese: 啤酒销售量的下降使该行业出现产能闲置。

detailed_translations.english: to make something such as time, money, or workers available for someone, especially when this is difficult for you to do
not being used or not needed at the present time

name: this time next year
trans: um diese Zeit im nächsten Jahr

sentences.english: I’m so sorry, I do apologize.
sentences.chinese: 非常对不起，我真心道歉。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that you are sorry that you have done something wrong

sentences.english: Jack and Helen had dropped behind in order to be alone.
sentences.chinese: 为了单独呆在一起，杰克和海伦故意让别人走在前面。

sentences.english: He polished off his work in order to see his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 为了去见女朋友，他匆忙地做完手头的工作。

sentences.english: She decathected from him in order to cope with his impending bankruptcy.
sentences.chinese: 为了对付他的即将来临的破产，她不再依恋他。

sentences.english: He glared at the people who surrounded the tent.
sentences.chinese: 他怒视着围住帐篷的那些人。

detailed_translations.english: to be all around someone or something on every side

sentences.chinese: 我需要在舒适的环境下工作。

detailed_translations.english: the objects, buildings, natural things etc that are around a person or thing at a particular time

sentences.chinese: 她在大街上漫无目的地到处游荡。

sentences.english: Pauline started to wander from the point.
sentences.chinese: 保利娜开始偏题了。

sentences.english: Don’t let any of the kids wander off.
sentences.chinese: 不要让任何一个小孩走开去。

detailed_translations.english: to walk slowly across or around an area, usually without a clear direction or purpose

sentences.english: a research proposal outline
sentences.chinese: 研究计划梗概

detailed_translations.english: the main ideas or facts about something, without the details
to describe something in a general way, giving the main points but not the details

sentences.english: Give that pan a stir , will you?
sentences.chinese: 把那锅东西搅一搅，好吗？

detailed_translations.english: an act of stirring something
to move a liquid or substance around with a spoon or stick in order to mix it together

sentences.english: the bear enclosure at the zoo
sentences.chinese: 动物园中的熊园

sentences.english: the enclosure of arable land for pasture
sentences.chinese: 将耕地圈起来用作牧场

detailed_translations.english: an area surrounded by a wall or fence, and used for a particular purpose

sentences.english: the removal of rubbish
sentences.chinese: 移除垃圾

sentences.english: stain removal
sentences.chinese: 去污

sentences.english: There are plans to split the corporation into a number of smaller independent companies.
sentences.chinese: 有计划要把这家大企业分割成一些独立的小公司。

detailed_translations.chinese: 独立； 自主； 自立

sentences.chinese: 有些人使用大麻来对抗疾病引起的疼痛或不适。

sentences.english: Happily, there was no apparent discomfort to any of the animals, although therewere some changes in pigmentation and superficial damage to the skin.
sentences.chinese: 令人高兴的是，虽然有某些色素沉着的改变和皮肤表面的损伤，这些动物没有出现明显的不适。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling of slight pain or of being physically uncomfortable

sentences.chinese: 未付的账单

sentences.chinese: 无偿劳动

detailed_translations.english: not yet paid

sentences.english: He’s gone to get some fish and chips.
sentences.chinese: 他去买炸鱼薯条了。

sentences.english: The film starred Jack Lemmon and Shirley Maclaine.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影由杰克·莱蒙和雪莉·麦克莱恩主演。

sentences.english: We’ve dealt with items one, two, and eleven.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经处理了第一项、第二项和第十一项。

sentences.chinese: 他身材高大、皮肤黝黑，相貌英俊。

sentences.english: He plays the guitar and sings folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 他弹吉他唱民歌。

sentences.chinese: 我没吃晚饭，现在饿极了！

name: and yet you have done nothing

sentences.chinese: 于是，这个是孟加拉的拜论，那个是孟加拉的爱默生，如此等等①。

sentences.english: It well reflects the calligrapher 's personal feelings, knowledge, personality, and so forth.
sentences.chinese: 它能很好地反映出书法家的个人感情、知识、个性等等。

sentences.english: Before you move in, you can make a list of any marks, scratches, and so forth that are already there.
sentences.chinese: 在搬进去住之前，您可以先把那里原有的任何污痕、刮伤等等列出一张清单。

sentences.english: For the query in this article, the basic statistics of the referenced tables, columns and indexes were collected, such as the table cardinality, column cardinality, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 对于本文中的查询，收集了引用表、列、索引的统计数据，如表基数、列基数等等。

sentences.chinese: 肯在工作中出了事故，不得不去医院。

sentences.english: I had a slight accident with your coffee.
sentences.chinese: 出了个小小的意外，我把你的咖啡弄洒了。

sentences.english: a train accident

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which someone is injured or something is damaged without anyone intending them to be

sentences.english: A lot of unkind things were said.
sentences.chinese: 说了很多刻薄话。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无情的；不仁慈的，不厚道的

sentences.english: a largely uneducated workforce
sentences.chinese: 大部分人都没受过教育的劳动力

detailed_translations.english: not educated to the usual level, or showing that someone is not well educated

sentences.english: There were roughly 200 people there.
sentences.chinese: 那儿大约有200人。

sentences.english: Azaleas flower at roughly the same time each year.
sentences.chinese: 杜鹃花每年的开花时间大致相同。

detailed_translations.english: not exactly

sentences.english: People who travel by rail still read an immense amount.
sentences.chinese: 人们坐火车旅行时仍然会读很多书。

sentences.english: Regular visits from a social worker can be of immense value to old people living alone.
sentences.chinese: 对于独居老人来说社工的经常探望很重要。

detailed_translations.english: extremely large

sentences.english: My whole future now seemed uncertain.
sentences.chinese: 现在我的前途似乎是个未知数。

detailed_translations.english: feeling doubt about something

sentences.english: ...a period of political uncertainty.
sentences.chinese: …一段政治不稳定时期。

sentences.english: Violent crimes against the elderly are fortunately very uncommon.
sentences.chinese: 幸好针对老年人的暴力犯罪非常罕见。

detailed_translations.english: rare or unusual

sentences.english: If you’re so unhappy, why don’t you change jobs?
sentences.chinese: 你要是那么不开心，为什么不换个工作呢？

sentences.chinese: 莱斯利的童年很不幸。

sentences.english: an unhappy marriage
sentences.chinese: 不幸的婚姻

sentences.chinese: 我非常不快乐。

detailed_translations.chinese: 不快乐的；不幸福的；不适当的

sentences.chinese: 无情的攻击

sentences.chinese: 残忍的杀手

detailed_translations.english: cruel and showing no kindness or forgiveness
