sentences.chinese: 露西伸长了脖子去亲吻他的脸颊。

sentences.english: Billy had rosy cheeks and blue eyes.
sentences.chinese: 比利脸颊红润，长着一双蓝眼睛。

sentences.english: her tear-stained cheeks
sentences.chinese: 她泪痕斑斑的脸颊

sentences.english: Julie’s cheeks flushed with pleasure at the compliment.
sentences.chinese: 听了这赞美的话，朱莉开心得满脸通红。

detailed_translations.english: the soft round part of your face below each of your eyes

detailed_translations.chinese: 无礼地向…讲话，对…大胆无礼

sentences.english: They were always there by you， whenever you needed them.
sentences.chinese: 无论何时你需要他们，他们总是在你身边。

detailed_translations.english: at any time

sentences.english: The house was lovely and warm.
sentences.chinese: 那房子漂亮温暖。

sentences.english: I hope we get some warm weather soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望天气很快就会回暖。

sentences.english: I’ve put your dinner in the oven to keep it warm.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的饭菜放进了烤箱里保温。

sentences.english: warm water
sentences.chinese: 温水

detailed_translations.english: slightly hot, especially in a pleasant way
to make someone or something warm or warmer, or to become warm or warmer

sentences.english: the warmth of the summer sun
sentences.chinese: 夏天太阳的暖意

sentences.english: the warmth of her smile
sentences.chinese: 她微笑中的热情

detailed_translations.english: the heat something produces, or when you feel warm

sentences.english: ‘Be careful, the rocks are slippery,’ Alex warned.
sentences.chinese: “小心，岩石很滑。”亚历克斯提醒说。

detailed_translations.english: to tell someone that something bad or dangerous may happen, so that they can avoid it or prevent it

sentences.chinese: 关于灰松鼠正威胁到红松鼠生存的警告

detailed_translations.english: something, especially a statement, that tells you that something bad, dangerous, or annoying might happen so that you can be ready or avoid it

sentences.chinese: 萨姆.纳恩参议员也一样，但他也告诫称：他想等着瞧，看还有什么事情会被踢爆出来。

sentences.english: Hurry up! Everyone’s waiting.
sentences.chinese: 快点！大家在等着呢。

sentences.english: Would you mind waiting outside?
sentences.chinese: 你在外面等好吗？

sentences.english: We’ve been waiting ages.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经等了很长时间了。

detailed_translations.english: to stay somewhere or not do something until something else happens, someone arrives etc
a period of time in which you wait for something to happen, someone to arrive etc

sentences.english: a beekeeper
sentences.chinese: 养蜂人

sentences.english: Bob is head lion keeper at the zoo.
sentences.chinese: 鲍勃是动物园养狮主管。

sentences.english: a lighthouse keeper
sentences.chinese: 灯塔管理员

detailed_translations.english: someone who looks after animals

sentences.english: Why are you crying?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么哭？

sentences.english: Why do we have to take all these tests?
sentences.chinese: 我们为什么一定要参加这些测验？

sentences.english: ‘She wants to meet you.’ ‘Why?’
sentences.chinese: “她想认识你。”“为什么？”

sentences.english: ‘I won’t be able to come into work tomorrow.’ ‘Why not?’
sentences.chinese: “我明天不能来上班。”“为什么？”

sentences.english: I have no idea why the television isn’t working.
sentences.chinese: 我不明白电视机为什么坏了。

sentences.english: Simon loves you – that’s why he wants to be with you.
sentences.chinese: 西蒙爱你——所以他想和你在一起。

sentences.english: He’s angry with me and I don’t know why.
sentences.chinese: 他生我气了，我不知道为什么。

sentences.english: There’s no reason why we shouldn’t be friends.
sentences.chinese: 我们没有理由不成为朋友。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the reason for something
used when you are surprised or have suddenly realized something

sentences.english: Show me what you bought.
sentences.chinese: 给我看看你买的东西。

sentences.english: What he did was morally wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他的行为很缺德。

detailed_translations.english: the thing which

sentences.english: She has shown no interest whatever in anything scientific.
sentences.chinese: 凡是与科学有关的她都没有表现出任何兴趣。

sentences.english: This is just a stupid argument that has nothing whatever to do with your job.
sentences.chinese: 这只是一场无聊的争论，和你的工作没有任何关系。

detailed_translations.chinese: [用于否定句中以加强语气]任何； 无论什么
detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize a negative statement

name: what can I do for you ?

sentences.english: She did the laundry (= washed the clothes etc ) and hung it out to dry.
sentences.chinese: 她洗了衣服，然后挂出去晾干。

sentences.english: a pile of dirty laundry
sentences.chinese: 一堆待洗的脏衣服

detailed_translations.english: clothes, sheets etc that need to be washed or have just been washed

sentences.english: There’s water all over the bathroom floor.
sentences.chinese: 浴室地面上都是水。

sentences.english: Does anyone want a drink of water?
sentences.chinese: 有谁想喝杯水吗？

sentences.english: a glass of sparkling mineral water
sentences.chinese: 一杯有气矿泉水

sentences.english: All rooms have hot and cold running water.
sentences.chinese: 所有房间都有冷热自来水供应。

sentences.english: Pour boiling water over the rice and let it soak.
sentences.chinese: 在大米中倒入沸水浸泡。

sentences.english: a fresh water spring
sentences.chinese: 淡水泉

sentences.english: When dealing with a burst pipe, always turn off the water first.
sentences.chinese: 处理破裂水管时，一定要先把水关掉。

sentences.english: contamination of the local water supply
sentences.chinese: 当地供水受到污染

sentences.english: Will you water my houseplants while I’m away?
sentences.chinese: 我不在时你能给我家里的盆栽浇浇水吗？

sentences.english: The garden needs watering daily.
sentences.chinese: 花园每天都需要浇水。

detailed_translations.english: the clear liquid without colour, smell, or taste that falls as rain and that is used for drinking, washing etc
if you water plants or the ground they are growing in, you pour water on them

sentences.english: ...Angel Falls, the world's highest waterfall.
sentences.chinese: …安赫尔瀑布，世界上最高的瀑布。

detailed_translations.english: a place where water from a river or stream falls down over a cliff or rock

sentences.english: hand-woven scarves
sentences.chinese: 手织围巾

sentences.english: Only a few of the women still weave.
sentences.chinese: 只有数量很少的妇女还在编织。

sentences.english: traditional basket weaving
sentences.chinese: 传统的编篮技术

detailed_translations.chinese: 迂回行进；编织；编造，编纂
detailed_translations.english: to make cloth, a carpet, a basket etc by crossing threads or thin pieces under and over each other by hand or on a loom
the way in which a material is woven, and the pattern formed by this

sentences.english: basket weavers
sentences.chinese: 编篮子的人

detailed_translations.english: someone whose job is to weave cloth

sentences.english: Go away!
sentences.chinese: 走开！

sentences.english: Dinah was crying as she drove slowly away.
sentences.chinese: 黛娜一边哭一边慢慢地开车走了。

detailed_translations.english: used to say that someone leaves a place or person, or stays some distance from a place or person

sentences.english: I walked nervously up the garden path towards the front door.
sentences.chinese: 我提心吊胆地沿着花园的小道向前门走去。

sentences.english: a well-worn path across the grass
sentences.chinese: 草地上被踏出的小径

sentences.english: Follow the path along the river to the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 沿着河边的小路走到那座桥。

sentences.english: a path leading to the summer house
sentences.chinese: 通往避暑别墅的小径

detailed_translations.english: a track that has been made deliberately or made by many people walking over the same ground

sentences.english: My family was in a bad way financially.
sentences.chinese: 我家当时经济窘迫。

sentences.english: The chicken’s nice and crispy – just the way I like it.
sentences.chinese: 这鸡肉很脆，正是我喜欢的口味。

sentences.english: It’s worth thinking how you can improve the way things are.
sentences.chinese: 你应该想想如何让现状变得更好。

detailed_translations.english: a particular state or condition

sentences.english: His business went under because of competition from the large corporations.
sentences.chinese: 由于大公司的竞争，他的生意陷入了困境。

sentences.english: There were fewer temporary engineers to plug in in that city because of low pay.
sentences.chinese: 由于报酬低，该城市雇用得到的临时工程师就更少了。

sentences.english: Many species are in peril of extinction because of our destruction of their natural habitat.
sentences.chinese: 许多物种由于我们破坏了它们的自然环境， 现在正面临灭绝的危险。

sentences.english: I ran away from home when I was sixteen.
sentences.chinese: 我16岁时离家出走。

sentences.english: After his beating, Colin ran away and hasn't been heard of since.
sentences.chinese: 挨打后科林出走了，从此杳无音信。

detailed_translations.english: If you run away from a place, you leave it because you are unhappy there

sentences.english: They're going to take my citizenship away.
sentences.chinese: 他们将夺走我的公民权。

sentences.english: "Give me the toy," he said softly, "or I'll take it away from you."
sentences.chinese: “给我玩具，”他轻声说道，“否则我就把它从你身边夺走。”

detailed_translations.english: If you take something away from someone, you remove it from them, so that they no longer possess it or have it with them

sentences.english: I never throw anything away.
sentences.chinese: 我从来不扔任何东西。

detailed_translations.english: When you throw away or throw out something that you do not want, you get rid of it, for example, by putting it in a rubbish container

sentences.english: His feet were aching from standing so long.
sentences.chinese: 他站了那么久，双脚隐隐作痛。

detailed_translations.english: if part of your body aches, you feel a continuous, but not very sharp pain there
a continuous pain that is not sharp or very strong

sentences.english: female voters
sentences.chinese: 女性选民

sentences.english: Over half of the staff is female.
sentences.chinese: 半数以上的员工是女性。

detailed_translations.english: relating to women or girls
an animal that belongs to the sex that can have babies or produce eggs

sentences.english: The government has softened its stance on public spending.
sentences.chinese: 政府对公共开支问题的态度软化了。

detailed_translations.english: to become or to make sb/sth more sympathetic and less severe or critical

sentences.english: She cannot accuse me of showing a bit of deceitful softness.
sentences.chinese: 她不能控诉我说我表示过一点虚伪的温柔。

sentences.english: This body type is softer, so you want to contrast the softness of the body with some structure.
sentences.chinese: 这种体型给人的感觉是柔软的，所以你想把身体的柔软和一部分体型结合起来。

sentences.english: Are you going home for Christmas?
sentences.chinese: 你回家过圣诞节吗？

sentences.english: a Christmas present
sentences.chinese: 圣诞礼物

sentences.english: the Christmas holidays
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节假期

sentences.english: Merry Christmas and a happy New Year everyone!
sentences.chinese: 祝大家圣诞快乐、新年快乐！

detailed_translations.english: the period of time around December 25th, the day when Christians celebrate the birth of Christ

sentences.english: We didn’t enjoy the day because the weather was so awful.
sentences.chinese: 那天我们很不尽兴，因为天气实在太糟。

sentences.english: ‘Why can’t I go?’ ‘Because you’re not old enough.’
sentences.chinese: “我为什么不能去？”“因为你年纪太小。”

sentences.english: Hubert never experienced any fear, and this was partly because he was not particularly intelligent.
sentences.chinese: 休伯特从来都没有害怕的感觉，部分原因是他这人不大聪明。

sentences.english: Many exam candidates lose marks simply because they do not read the questions properly.
sentences.chinese: 许多应试者失分只是因为没有好好地读题。

sentences.english: I decided to go with them, mainly because I had nothing better to do.
sentences.chinese: 我决定和他们一起去，主要是因为我没有更好的事情可做。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are giving the reason for something

sentences.english: a glass of wine
sentences.chinese: 一杯葡萄酒

detailed_translations.english: an alcoholic drink made from grapes, or a type of this drink
to entertain someone well with a meal, wine etc

sentences.english: young white males
sentences.chinese: 年轻的白种男性

detailed_translations.english: belonging to the race of people with pale skin

sentences.english: This stuff is supposed to whiten your teeth.
sentences.chinese: 这东西应该是用来增白牙齿的。

detailed_translations.english: to become more white, or to make something do this

sentences.english: a man of great wisdom
sentences.chinese: 一个有大智慧的男人

sentences.english: You can always expect a few words of wisdom from Dave.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫总能冒出几句至理名言。

detailed_translations.english: good sense and judgment, based especially on your experience of life

sentences.english: We can walk to my house from here. It isn’t far.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以从这里步行去我家，不远。

sentences.english: You could see the mountains in the far distance.
sentences.chinese: 你可以看到远处的群山。

sentences.english: Since I changed jobs, I have to travel further to get to work.
sentences.chinese: 我换了工作，上班更远了。

detailed_translations.english: a long distance away
a long distance

sentences.english: We decided not to go any farther.
sentences.chinese: 我们决定不再往前走了。

sentences.english: Most of them were locals, but some had come from farther afield (= a greater distance away ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们大部分是当地人，但也有一些来自较远的地方。

sentences.english: A table stood at the farther end of the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 厨房的那一头放着一张桌子。

detailed_translations.english: a greater distance than before or than something else; a  comparative  form of ‘far’
more distant; a  comparative  form of ‘far’

sentences.english: They walked a little further.
sentences.chinese: 他们又往前走了一点。

sentences.english: His hands moved further down her back.
sentences.chinese: 他的手在她背上继续往下滑。

sentences.english: They’ve never been further south than San Diego.
sentences.chinese: 他们从没有到过比圣迭戈更往南的地方。

detailed_translations.english: a greater distance, or beyond a particular place
more or additional

sentences.english: The state of Nevada is largely desert.
sentences.chinese: 内华达州大部分是沙漠。

sentences.english: It had been a tiring day, largely because of all the tedious waiting.
sentences.chinese: 那一天真累人，主要是因为等得无聊。

detailed_translations.english: mostly or mainly

sentences.english: The economy is in danger of collapse unless far-reaching reforms are implemented.
sentences.chinese: 除非实施影响深远的改革，否则经济就有崩溃的危险。

detailed_translations.english: having a great influence or effect

sentences.english: a field of wheat
sentences.chinese: 小麦地

detailed_translations.english: the grain that bread is made from, or the plant that it grows on

sentences.english: From whom shall I get comfort?
sentences.chinese: 我从谁那儿能得到安慰呢?

sentences.english: The dispute at the moment revolved about the question of whom to send.
sentences.chinese: 当时的争论是围绕着派谁去好这一问题而进行的。

sentences.english: Which book are you looking for?
sentences.chinese: 你在找哪本书？

sentences.english: Which are the most important crops?
sentences.chinese: 哪些农作物是最重要的？

sentences.english: Miranda was sure it was one of them, but was not sure which.
sentences.chinese: 米兰达确定此人是他们其中的一个，但不能肯定是哪一个。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about one or more members of a group of people or things, when you are uncertain about it or about them

sentences.english: Who locked the door?
sentences.chinese: 谁锁的门？

sentences.english: Who do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你为谁工作？

sentences.english: Who’s that guy with your wife?
sentences.chinese: 和你妻子在一起的那个人是谁？

sentences.english: They never found out who the murderer was.
sentences.chinese: 他们一直未查出谁是凶犯。

sentences.english: She wondered who had sent the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 她不知道是谁送的花。

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about which person is involved, or what the name of a person is

sentences.english: Letting taxes rise abruptly would hurt not only the recovery but also whichever party the electorate ended up blaming.
sentences.chinese: 突然的增税不但会妨害经济复苏，而且无论哪个政党这样做都会受到选民指责。

detailed_translations.chinese: 无论哪个， 无论哪些

sentences.english: Dee watched the waves breaking on the shore.
sentences.chinese: 迪伊凝视着拍岸的波涛。

sentences.english: The ship tipped over, and finally vanished beneath the waves.
sentences.chinese: 船倾覆了，最终沉没在海浪之下。

detailed_translations.english: a line of raised water that moves across the surface of the sea
if you wave something, or if it waves, it moves from side to side

sentences.english: She had short, wavy brown hair.
sentences.chinese: 她有一头又短又卷的褐发。

detailed_translations.english: wavy hair grows in waves

sentences.english: Tuberculosis is still common in some parts of the world .
sentences.chinese: 结核病在世界上某些地区仍很常见。

sentences.english: At that time China was the most powerful country in the world .
sentences.chinese: 当时中国是世界上最强大的国家。

sentences.english: The Taj Mahal attracts visitors from around the world .
sentences.chinese: 泰姬陵吸引了来自世界各地的游客。

sentences.english: Students from all over the world come to study at Oxford.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的学生到牛津大学来求学。

sentences.english: Children are the same the world over .
sentences.chinese: 全世界的孩子都一样。

sentences.english: The book has been published throughout the world .
sentences.chinese: 这本书已在世界各地出版。

sentences.english: There is nothing quite like it anywhere in the world .
sentences.chinese: 世界上任何地方都找不出和它类似的东西。

sentences.english: Europe’s relationship with the rest of the world
sentences.chinese: 欧洲和世界上其他地区的关系

sentences.english: I decided to take a year off to travel the world .
sentences.chinese: 我决定休息一年去周游世界。

sentences.english: a crime that shocked the world
sentences.chinese: 震惊全世界的罪行

detailed_translations.chinese: 世界；领域；世俗；全人类；物质生活
detailed_translations.english: the  planet  we live on, and all the people, cities, and countries on it

sentences.english: Einstein's equations showed the universe to be expanding.
sentences.chinese: 爱因斯坦的方程式表明宇宙正在扩大。

detailed_translations.english: all space, including all the stars and planets

sentences.english: He seemed very calm and far removed from worldly concerns.
sentences.chinese: 他显得非常淡定，完全没有俗世的忧虑。

detailed_translations.english: relating to ordinary life rather than spiritual or religious ideas

sentences.english: Today, doctors are fearing a worldwide epidemic.
sentences.chinese: 如今，医生们在担心一次世界性的流行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 遍及地球的， 世界范围的
detailed_translations.english: Worldwide is also an adjective

sentences.english: It could be and I believe it will be—the turning point of your life.
sentences.chinese: 这本书可能是，而且我坚信它会是——你生活中的转折点。

sentences.english: Yet, still, it was the turning point in my life - because I was no longer biasing myself against God.
sentences.chinese: 然而，这仍是我人生中的一个转折点，因为从此以后我不再对上帝存有偏见。

sentences.english: OpenStreetMaps is itself at a turning point as it tries to progress from a techie-driven project to one that the ordinary consumer can not only understand but contribute to as well.
sentences.chinese: “开放式街道地图”自身正处在一个转折点，因为它试图从一个技术驱动的项目发展为普通消费者不仅可以理解也对它作出贡献的项目。

detailed_translations.english: the time when an important change starts, especially one that improves the situation

sentences.english: ...spending her few waking hours in front of the TV.
sentences.chinese: …把她清醒的个把钟头花在电视机前。

detailed_translations.english: not many or hardly any people or things

sentences.english: I’ll take whoever wants to go.
sentences.chinese: 谁想去我就带谁去。

sentences.english: When you’re done with the book, just give it to Kristin or Shelley or whoever.
sentences.chinese: 你看完书以后，就给克里斯廷或谢利，或者随便谁都行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谁； 无论谁； 究竟是谁
detailed_translations.english: used to say that it does not matter who does something, is in a particular place etc

sentences.english: advertising aimed at 18–25 year olds
sentences.chinese: 针对18到25岁人群的广告

sentences.english: a career in advertising
sentences.chinese: 广告业生涯

detailed_translations.english: the activity or business of advertising things on television, in newspapers etc

sentences.english: a modestly equipped workshop.
sentences.chinese: 一个装备普通的车间。

detailed_translations.english: a room or building where tools and machines are used for making or repairing things

sentences.english: I don’t have the right tools to start fiddling around with the engine.
sentences.chinese: 我没有合适的工具来摆弄发动机。

sentences.english: a shop selling garden tools
sentences.chinese: 出售园艺工具的商店

detailed_translations.chinese: 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段
detailed_translations.english: something that you hold in your hand and use to do a particular job

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用工具；用机床装备工厂

sentences.english: One of the pictures is worth £50,000.
sentences.chinese: 其中一幅画值5万英镑。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

detailed_translations.english: having a value in money, etc.
how good or useful something is or how important it is to people

sentences.english: The house was full of worthless junk.
sentences.chinese: 这房子里堆满了没有用的东西。

sentences.english: The information was worthless to me.
sentences.chinese: 这些资料对我毫无用处。

detailed_translations.english: something that is worthless has no value, importance, or use

sentences.english: In essence his message was very simple.
sentences.chinese: 实质上他想表达的意思很简单。

detailed_translations.english: the most basic and important quality of something

sentences.english: Window locks are fairly cheap and absolutely essential.
sentences.chinese: 窗锁相当便宜，绝对有必要安装。

sentences.english: Even in small companies, computers are an essential tool.
sentences.chinese: 即使在小公司里，计算机也是不可或缺的工具。

detailed_translations.english: extremely important and necessary
something that is necessary to do something or in a particular situation

sentences.english: You will then have only a pair of trousers, a waistcoat, a hat and a coat.
sentences.chinese: 您只剩下一条长裤，一件背心，一顶帽子和一件短上衣了。

sentences.english: In the cartoon, John Bull appears as a short, stocky figure wearing a waistcoat with the British flag on.
sentences.chinese: 在漫画中，“约翰牛”常以矮小健壮的形象出现，身穿印有英国国旗的背心。

sentences.english: After sleeping in the sledge and dining in the kitchen, to sit in an arm-chair in clean linen, in thin boots, with a chain on one’s waistcoat, is such luxury!
sentences.chinese: 经过在雪撬上睡觉和在厨房吃饭后，穿着干净的亚麻布衣服，细薄的靴子坐在靠背椅里，某人的马甲上还挂着表链，这一切是多么的奢侈了啊！

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing without sleeves that has buttons down the front and is worn over a shirt, often under a jacket as part of a man’s suit

sentences.english: The route then heads west over Gerrick Moor.
sentences.chinese: 之后这条路折向西，穿过格里克漠泽。

sentences.english: the west door of the church
sentences.chinese: 教堂的西门

sentences.english: A damp wind blew from the west.
sentences.chinese: 从西面吹来一股潮湿的风。

sentences.english: a west-facing window
sentences.chinese: 朝西的窗户

detailed_translations.english: towards the west
in the west or facing the west
the direction towards which the sun goes down, and which is on the left if you are facing north

sentences.english: the western end of the bay
sentences.chinese: 海湾的西端

sentences.english: Western Australia
sentences.chinese: 西澳大利亚

detailed_translations.chinese: 西方的，西部的；有西方特征的
detailed_translations.english: in or from the west of a country or area

detailed_translations.chinese: 西方人；西部片，西部小说
detailed_translations.english: a film about life in the 19th century in the American West, especially the lives of cowboys

sentences.english: ...the one-hour westward flight over the Andes to Lima.
sentences.chinese: …越过安第斯山脉到利马一小时的向西飞行。

detailed_translations.english: Westward is also an adjective
towards the west

sentences.english: What’s the weather like today?
sentences.chinese: 今天天气如何？

sentences.english: The weather turned bitterly cold.
sentences.chinese: 天气变得很冷了。

detailed_translations.english: the temperature and other conditions such as sun, rain, and wind

detailed_translations.chinese: 经受住；使风化；侵蚀；使受风吹雨打
detailed_translations.english: if rock, wood, or someone’s face is weathered by the wind, sun, rain etc, or if it weathers, it changes colour or shape over a period of time

sentences.english: He was full of his own importance (= he behaved in an annoying way which showed that he thought he was very important ).
sentences.chinese: 他自以为很了不起。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being important

sentences.english: Rebel gunmen have put up strong resistance.
sentences.chinese: 持枪的叛乱分子负隅顽抗。

sentences.english: disease resistance
sentences.chinese: 抗病能力

detailed_translations.english: fighting against someone who is attacking you

sentences.english: to resist change
sentences.chinese: 抵制变革

sentences.english: He tried to pin me down, but I resisted.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制伏我，但我奋力反抗。

detailed_translations.english: to refuse to accept sth and try to stop it from happening

sentences.english: How do you spell your name?
sentences.chinese: 你的名字怎么拼写？

sentences.english: How can I help you?
sentences.chinese: 我怎么帮你？

sentences.english: I’d like to help in some way, but I’m not sure how.
sentences.chinese: 我想帮点忙，可不知道该怎么做。

sentences.english: He explained how the system worked.
sentences.chinese: 他讲解了该系统是如何运转的。

sentences.english: We both used to work at the airport – that’s how we met.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都曾经在机场工作过，我们就是这么认识的。

sentences.english: advice on how best (= the best way ) to invest your money
sentences.chinese: 如何以最好方式进行投资的建议

sentences.english: They had a number of suggestions as to how the service could be improved.
sentences.chinese: 他们有一些关于如何改进服务的建议。

sentences.english: This still leaves the question of how local services should be funded.
sentences.chinese: 这仍然没有解决如何为地方公共服务业提供资金的问题。

sentences.english: How many kids do they have now?
sentences.chinese: 他们现在有几个孩子？

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the way in which something happens or is done

sentences.english: But what if you have a lot of audio material to listen to, such as audio books or podcasts?
sentences.chinese: 但是如果你有很多像有声书或播客这样的音频材料要听，那该怎么办呢？

sentences.english: We have better use for our money such as saving or sharing it, and because I want my children to care about their impact on the environment, the economic state of our country and our humanity.
sentences.chinese: 我们要更好的用我们的钱，比如存起来或和别人一起共享，因为我希望我的孩子认识到他们自己对环境的影响，以及我们国家经济状况和我们的人性。

sentences.english: A better way to do all this is to load the data into one database, then perform a query, such as that shown below.
sentences.chinese: 做所有这些事情的一个更好办法是将数据加载到一个数据库中，然后执行查询，比如下面的查询。

sentences.english: Can you say that again? I didn’t hear.
sentences.chinese: 你能再说一遍吗？ 我没听见。

sentences.english: I’ll never go there again.
sentences.chinese: 我再也不会去那儿了。

sentences.english: Mr Khan’s busy. Can you try again later?
sentences.chinese: 卡恩先生正忙着。 你能不能过一会儿再打来？

sentences.english: In 1997, the family moved house yet again.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，全家人再一次搬家。

sentences.english: And again, these workshops will benefit the community widely.
sentences.chinese: 再说，这些工作坊会令社区很多人受惠。

detailed_translations.english: one more time – used when something has happened or been done before

sentences.english: Can you repeat your question?
sentences.chinese: 你能重复一遍你的问题吗？

sentences.english: Sorry - could you repeat that?
sentences.chinese: 对不起——你能再说一遍吗？

sentences.english: It is not, I repeat not, my fault.
sentences.chinese: 那不是我的错，我再说一遍，不是。

sentences.english: It was a terrible journey - I hope we don’t have a repeat performance (= have the same thing happen again ) on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 这一路上太糟糕了——我希望回程可不要再发生同样的事。

detailed_translations.english: to say or write something again
an event that is very like something that happened before

sentences.english: repeated calls for change
sentences.chinese: 再三呼吁变革

sentences.english: repeated attempts to kill him
sentences.chinese: 再三企图杀害他

detailed_translations.english: done or happening again and again

sentences.english: The young birds weigh only a few grams.
sentences.chinese: 雏鸟重量只有几克。

sentences.english: Do you know how much it weighs?
sentences.chinese: 你知道它的重量吗？

sentences.english: (= how much ) do you weigh?
sentences.chinese: 你的体重是多少？

sentences.english: The box was full of books and weighed a ton (= was very heavy ).
sentences.chinese: 这箱子里放满了书，重得很。

detailed_translations.english: to have a particular weight

sentences.english: The meadow has been ploughed up.
sentences.chinese: 那片草地已用犁翻过。

sentences.english: The colt bounded through the meadow.
sentences.chinese: 那匹马驹跳着跑过牧场。

sentences.english: There are many lambs capering in the meadow.

sentences.chinese: 我起先没有将这事告诉你们，因为我与你们同在。

sentences.chinese: 大众传媒课程的内容包括稿件写作、剪辑和摄像操作。

sentences.chinese: 我感到暖和、舒适和满意。

sentences.chinese: 例如，在认知测试中，青少年做得几乎和成人一样好。

sentences.chinese: 我要先提醒你，我跳舞不是很好。

sentences.chinese: 该世纪上半叶，人口大幅度增加。

sentences.chinese: 来这里的参观者自5月起已增至原来的三倍。

sentences.chinese: 乔舔了舔干燥的嘴唇。

sentences.english: Together they went back inside the villa.
sentences.chinese: 他们一起回到了别墅里。

detailed_translations.chinese: 一起；同时；相互；连续地；总共
detailed_translations.english: if two or more people do something together, they do it with each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 新潮的；情绪稳定的，做事有效率的

sentences.english: A sudden rise in oil prices could lead to a breakdown of the economy.
sentences.chinese: 油价暴涨会导致经济崩溃。

sentences.english: The breakdown of the negotiations was not unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 谈判的失败是预料之中的事。

detailed_translations.english: a failure of a relationship, discussion or system

sentences.english: Could you get an extra loaf of bread?
sentences.chinese: 你能多拿一条面包吗？

sentences.english: Allow extra time for your journey.
sentences.chinese: 要给你的旅程多留出点时间。

sentences.english: Drivers are advised to take extra care.
sentences.chinese: 建议司机开车要格外小心。

sentences.english: You’re going to have to work extra hard to pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 你要格外用功才能通过考试。

detailed_translations.english: more of something, in addition to the usual or standard amount or number
used to emphasize an adjective or adverb

sentences.english: Frances achieved very good exam results.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西丝考试取得了优异成绩。

sentences.english: Wilson has achieved considerable success as an artist.
sentences.chinese: 威尔逊作为一名艺术家成就斐然。

sentences.english: She eventually achieved her goal of becoming a professor.
sentences.chinese: 她终于实现目标，当上了教授。

detailed_translations.english: to successfully complete something or get a good result, especially by working hard

sentences.english: Despite her disability, Philippa is very confident.
sentences.chinese: 菲莉帕虽然有残疾，却很自信。

detailed_translations.chinese: 确信的， 肯定的； 自信的
detailed_translations.english: sure that something will happen in the way that you want or expect

sentences.english: a small village twenty miles from Nairobi
sentences.chinese: 距内罗毕20英里的一个小村庄

sentences.english: I’m nearly twenty (= 20 years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 我快20岁了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 20
the number 20

sentences.english: He came in twentieth.
sentences.chinese: 他得了第二十名。

sentences.english: If you are twentieth, do you get a medal?
sentences.chinese: 如果你第二十，你得到奖牌吗？

sentences.english: Tutti was always first in her class before, but has slipped since the last move down to twentieth out of fifty children.
sentences.chinese: 图蒂从前在班上总是名列前茅，但打从上回搬家后，名次已掉到五十个学童当中的第二十名。

sentences.english: I’d like you to line up in twos, please.
sentences.chinese: 请你们两个一组排好队。

detailed_translations.english: in groups of two people or things
the number 2

sentences.english: He was questioned by police twice yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天被警察审问了两次。

sentences.english: None of our dinner menus are exactly the same twice over .
sentences.chinese: 我们的晚餐菜单从没有完全重样的。

detailed_translations.english: two times

sentences.english: We have to stop her pinching her baby brother.
sentences.chinese: 我们不能让她再掐她小弟弟了。

sentences.english: He pinched her cheek.
sentences.chinese: 他捏了一下她的脸颊。

sentences.english: Put all the ingredients, including a pinch of salt, into a food processor.
sentences.chinese: 将所有的配料，连同一撮盐，放进食品加工机里。

detailed_translations.english: to press a part of someone’s skin very tightly between your finger and thumb, especially so that it hurts
A pinch of an ingredient such as salt is the amount of it that you can hold between your thumb and your first finger

sentences.english: The girl quickly disappeared among the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 女孩转眼消失在人群中。

sentences.english: I could hear voices coming from somewhere among the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 我能听到灌木丛中某个地方传来说话的声音。

sentences.english: We walked among the chestnut woods on the mountain slopes.
sentences.chinese: 我们走在山坡上的栗树林中。

sentences.english: She began rummaging among the books on her desk.
sentences.chinese: 她开始在桌子上的一堆书中乱翻起来。

detailed_translations.english: in or through the middle of a group of people or things

sentences.english: He decided no assassin would chance a shot from amongst that crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他认定，没有刺客会冒险混在人群里开枪。

detailed_translations.english: in or through the middle of a group of people or things

sentences.english: He supplements his regular meals by eating between meals.
sentences.chinese: 他在两餐之间吃点东西来补充正餐。

sentences.english: The object of these experiments was to find the connection, if any, between the two phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 这些实验的目的就是探索这两种现象之间的联系，如果存在着任何联系的话。

sentences.english: He received a twelve-month jail sentence.
sentences.chinese: 他获刑12个月。

sentences.english: Come at twelve (= 12 o’clock ) .
sentences.chinese: 12点来。

sentences.english: Their son Dylan is twelve (= 12 years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的儿子迪伦12岁。

detailed_translations.english: the number 12
the number 12

sentences.english: Captain: : You're the twelfth in a long line of governesses, who have come to look after my children since their mother died.
sentences.chinese: 上校：自从孩子们的母亲去世以后，你是来照看他们的第十二位女家庭教师。

sentences.english: NIV] the fifth sardonyx, the sixth carnelian, the seventh chrysolite, the eighth beryl, the ninth topaz, the tenth chrysoprase, the eleventh jacinth, and the twelfth amethyst.
sentences.chinese: 第五是红玛瑙，第六是红宝石，第七是黄璧玺；第八是水苍玉；第九是红璧玺；第十是翡翠；第十一是紫玛瑙；第十二是紫晶。

detailed_translations.english: one of twelve equal parts of something
one of twelve equal parts of something
